• 〈台股開盤〉台積電一馬當先創天價1875元 領軍大漲643點衝上3萬3新高

news.Title: 2 Dividend Stocks That Are Off to Hot Starts to 2026
news.Content:
The S&P 500 is off to a fairly underwhelming start. As of Monday's close, it was up less than 2% since January. Many growth stocks have been struggling, while dividend stocks are suddenly becoming hot buys.

Two dividend stocks that are off to hot starts since the beginning of the year are Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) and Texas Instruments (NASDAQ: TXN) . They have soared past the broad index, and here's why it might not be too late to invest in them.

Where to invest $1,000 right now? Our analyst team just revealed what they believe are the 10 best stocks to buy right now, when you join Stock Advisor. See the stocks »

Entering trading on Tuesday, Lockheed Martin's stock was up 32% year to date. It's a fantastic performance after an unexciting year in 2025, when its share price was flat.

The company posted some strong earnings numbers at the end of January, reporting that its backlog was a record $194 billion. Its numbers came in better than its own expectations, and the business said it experienced "unprecedented demand" in the previous year. With strong government relationships and more growth expected for 2026, it's little wonder the defense stock has been a good buy early on.

Its yield of 2.2% is also about twice what you'd get with the average S&P 500 stock right now. And at 21 times its expected future earnings (based on analyst projections), it's not an expensive stock to own, either. For long-term investors, Lockheed Martin can be a great stock to buy and hold.

Another stock that's been red hot to start 2026 is semiconductor company Texas Instruments. It's up just over 26% and it also recently released its earnings numbers. For the last three months of 2025, its revenue of $4.4 billion rose by 10% year over year, as demand from data centers has been strong and driving a lot of growth for the business.

Its diversified semiconductor business features more than 80,000 parts that help companies in various industries, making it an attractive option for growth-oriented investors. Its forward price-to-earnings multiple of 33 is a bit high, but with some encouraging long-term growth prospects and its data center segment potentially being a catalyst for the foreseeable future, the stock can still be a suitable option for investors who are looking to buy and hold for years.

Texas Instruments pays an above-average dividend that yields 2.6%, and it has been increasing its payout for 22 consecutive years. This is not only a promising growth investment, but also a terrific dividend stock to hang on to for the long haul.

news.Title: 發哥不威了？聯發科1月營收低去年同期 坦言手機業務面臨挑戰
news.Content:
聯發科（2454）公布今年1月合併營收為469.77億元，年減8.15％、月減8.37％，營收表現低於去年同期，也反映第一季淡季效應與終端需求調整壓力。聯發科日前於法說會中預估，第一季營收將持平至季減6%，外界推估，第一季營收區間約落在1,411億元至1,502億元之間。
聯發科坦言，智慧型手機業務面臨較嚴峻挑戰，主要受到記憶體價格與整體製造成本上揚影響，第一季手機平台營收恐出現明顯下滑。業界透露，DDR4記憶體價格漲幅驚人，再加上晶圓代工費用調整，使智慧型手機整機成本顯著上升，進而壓抑終端需求與客戶拉貨意願。
不過，聯發科智慧裝置平台業務將成為第一季營運的重要支撐。隨著通訊、電視及運算裝置需求逐步自淡季回溫，可望部分抵銷手機業務下滑影響。法人分析，即便不計入資料中心 ASIC 貢獻，智慧裝置平台業務於2026年仍可維持穩健成長，顯示公司產品組合具備結構性韌性。

news.Title: 外資狂掃557億神山噴 台股攻上3萬3刷新高 /記憶體震盪休息 載板三雄接棒吸金/馬年投資別亂押 專家點名主戰場｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
AI晶片與軟體股在歷經前波修正後回神，市場對企業AI資本支出與算力需求前景轉趨樂觀，加上分析師上修評等帶動資金回流科技族群，激勵美股四大指數全面收紅，道瓊上漲0.04%，連兩日創歷史收盤新高，那斯達克上漲0.90%，標普500指數上漲0.47%，費城半導體指數上漲1.42%。盤面個股表現，甲骨文獲調升評等強彈逾9%，帶動微軟等軟體股同步走高，輝達、博通、超微等AI晶片股漲幅均逾2%，顯示市場重新聚焦AI長線動能；不過在非農就業與CPI等關鍵經濟數據公布前，投資人態度仍偏謹慎，聯準會降息時程預期維持觀望。台積電ADR同步走強1.88%，延續半導體族群多頭氣氛。
亞股方面延續偏多格局，日經指數上漲2.28%再創高點，韓股小幅上揚0.07%，港股上漲0.58%，上證指數則小漲0.13%，區域市場受到科技股反彈帶動氣氛轉暖。
回到台股，在美股科技股領漲激勵下，加權指數大漲668.35點、收33,072.97點，成交金額6,576.52億元，成功站上33,000點並改寫歷史新高。權王 台積電(2330) 強漲65元刷新天花板價推升指數，資金明顯集中於大型電子權值股；AI伺服器與先進封裝題材持續發酵，而部分記憶體與高檔個股則出現整理，顯示盤面呈現「權值強、中小型股分歧」的輪動格局。
📝盤點熱門股：旺宏、凱基台灣TOP50、華邦電 今日熱門成交股方面，市場資金聚焦題材與族群輪動，記憶體族群包辦多檔熱門股，其中 旺宏(2337) 以27.12萬張奪下成交王，股價走揚，反映記憶體紅包行情與資金關注度仍高；同族群的 華邦電(2344) 則下挫，主要因族群短線漲多後出現震盪整理； 力積電(6770) 小漲，延續市場對記憶體景氣循環與題材期待。
ETF方面，新掛牌的 凱基台灣TOP50(009816) 在上市初期資金追捧下續強，成交熱度維持；至於面板族群 群創(3481) 股價小跌，延續面板與衛星板轉弱後的調節賣壓，使成交動能維持高檔。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計買超630.14億元，其中外資大舉買超557.10億元成為推升大盤主力，資金回流電子與權值股，帶動指數強勢攻高；投信同步買超44.76億元，顯示內資仍偏向加碼布局；自營商也加碼28.28億元，整體法人同步站在買方，反映市場風險偏好提升與資金追價力道，使收盤維持強勢格局。
✨本日議題股：載板概念股 載板概念股再度成為盤面焦點，隨著元月營收公布帶動市場重新評價族群基本面， 南電(8046) 、 欣興(3037) 、 景碩(3189) 等「載板三雄」表現分歧。其中南電在解除處置後首日震盪走高，盤中出現殺低後急拉，並再創波段新高，顯示資金回流跡象；而部分個股雖公告營收報喜，卻呈現開高走低，反映短線漲多後市場追價轉趨保守。外資表示...... 點我看更多
👥馬年抱股停看聽： 隨著台股封關倒數，「抱股過年」再度成為市場焦點。統計近20年台股農曆年後開紅盤表現，共出現「14勝6敗」，勝率達7成，使不少投資人重新評估是否持股迎長假行情。市場觀察指出，今年在AI題材與權值股帶動下，大盤創高後仍維持強勢結構，增加抱股過年的信心，但專家提醒，抱股關鍵不在於「要不要抱」，而在..... .點我看更多
🔭重大財經事件展望 周三國際財經事件，先鎖定美國1月非農就業報告、失業率與平均每小時工資等關鍵就業數據，牽動聯準會降息預期與美元、債券殖利率走向；歐洲、亞太區、港澳則暫無重量級數據公布。。
台灣方面，留意法說與籌資動向帶來的題材催化，其中 穩懋(3105) 、 力旺(3529) 召開法說，市場將聚焦營運展望、訂單能見度與毛利率趨勢等關鍵訊息；另 長虹(5534) 辦理現增，資金用途與籌資條件、後續對財務結構與股價的影響亦值得關注。

news.Title: 〈智原法說〉Q1營收估季減1成 拿下5奈米ASIC案件
news.Content:
智原 (3035-TW) 今 (10) 日召開法說會，總經理王國雍指出，第一季營收約莫季減 10%，不過，隨著公司布局先進製程與先進封裝的效益逐步顯現，公司已拿下 5 奈米的專案，並有高達 9 個先進封裝的案件將在今年陸續量產，預計今年營運將季季高，全年營運樂觀看。
智原預估，第一季營收季減約 10%，其中 IP 業務呈現季增，但 NRE 與量產 (MP) 營收同步下滑，單季毛利率約落在 45%。展望 2026 年，智原在扣除 2025 年一次性備料因素後，預估全年營收將呈現年增低雙位數 (11-13%) 幅度，其中 IP 業務穩定成長，NRE 顯著放大，量產營收則逐步走升，對中長期營運維持審慎樂觀態度。
王國雍表示，公司正積極爭取先進製程與先進封裝新案，去年先進製程共取得 5 個 Design win，不僅案件數量增加，製程節點也從 12/14 奈米推進至更先進節點，目前接案最先進製程已達 4 奈米，顯示接案結構出現明顯質變，未來量產後可望帶來可觀營收貢獻。
在先進封裝方面，智原指出，高階封裝與先進製程 ASIC 密不可分，公司從 SoC Die 設計切入，並以彈性商務模式串聯供應鏈。去年已取得 10 個先進封裝案件，涵蓋 2.5D 與 3D 封裝，今年預計將有 9 項產品陸續進入量產，並依專案進度逐步放量，預期第四季貢獻度最高。
同時，智原持續提升國際客戶比重，去年國際客戶開案占比已達 6 成，客戶遍及歐美與日本，應用領域多與雲端 AI 相關，包括 Smart NIC 與特殊領域的 AI 加速器等。
展望 2026 年，智原點出四大關鍵趨勢，將逐步轉化為公司長期成長動能，包括專用型 AI、邊緣與終端 AI、ASIC 資源排擠效應，以及晶圓廠產能排擠效應。智原指出，金融與健康醫療等專用型 AI 應用市場正逐步打開，公司近期已接獲相關案件；AI 運算架構也持續由雲端向邊緣端擴散。另一方面，雲端服務業者 (CSP) 積極自研 ASIC，排擠設計資源，反而突顯智原既有設計能量與整合能力的優勢。
在產能端，智原觀察到先進製程需求外溢效應，不僅影響 ASIC 開案資源，也延伸至晶圓廠端，相關產能需求轉向與智原合作的晶圓代工夥伴。
智原進一步指出，2025 年將是業務結構新舊交替期，自今年起營運將出現結構性改變，除了成熟製程逐步復甦，更重要的是先進製程快速擴張。目前先進製程需求已「爆棚」，已有超過 10 個 FinFET 專案進入設計階段，並將於今年開始貢獻營收。
公司預期，今年第一季為全年營運谷底，隨著 9 顆先進封裝產品於年底前量產，全年營運將呈現季季高走勢。上半年成長動能以 NRE 為主，下半年除 FinFET 量產營收外，先進封裝貢獻也將同步放大，下半年表現可望明顯優於上半年。

news.Title: 《台股盤後》大漲668點、首收33K，日K連三紅
news.Content:
MoneyDJ新聞 2026-02-10 15:58:30 新聞中心 發佈
美股四大指數週一全面上揚，日股今(10)日亦持續走高，加上市場普遍對台積電盤後的10月營收數據持樂觀預期，挹注台股今日開盤就由權王台積電領漲並強拉尾盤，同時智邦、日月光投控持續走高，且前20大權值股多走揚，加上金融股、電子通路及通信網路族群助攻下，激勵加權指數終場收在最高點33072.97，大漲668.35點或2.06%、日K連三紅，改寫歷史新高紀錄，成交量6565.05億元。

軟體、AI晶片類股回神，激勵那斯達克指數站回100日移動平均線、費城半導體指數同步跳高，但隨著關鍵經濟數據即將出爐、投資人謹慎行事，標準普爾500指數終場未能刷新收盤新高。亞洲股市方面，因高市早苗領導的自民黨在眾院選舉大勝的效應持續，激勵日經225指數續衝，終場大漲2.28%；韓股擁外資與機構的買盤支撐，KOSPI指數收漲0.07%。

台股今日持續走高、終場大漲逾660點，順利站上33000點大關。電子股普遍上漲，台積電開高走高，終場以最高價1880元作收、上漲3.58%，欣興、健策、智邦勁揚逾6%，日月光投控、鴻勁、國巨*都走高，且前20大權值股當中的電子股僅南亞科收黑1.28%、聯電平盤，其餘皆為上漲走勢。
以29大類股來看，半導體類股今漲幅最高、達3.15%，祥碩漲逾半根停板，穎崴、京元電子、創意連袂走揚。電子通路族群亦表現不俗，增你強、文曄挾營收優預期，今日股價分別為收漲停，飆漲逾8%，全科、威健、安馳齊揚。傳產股部分，台塑四寶全面收黑，拖累整體塑膠及油電燃氣族群走勢疲弱，玻璃陶瓷、生技醫療以及電器電纜類股亦同步下挫。
三大法人動向方面，今日三大法人總計買超630.15億元；其中，外資及陸資(不含外資自營商)買超557.11億元，投信買超44.76億元，自營商買超28.28億元。

news.Title: 智原去年每股賺2.81元 續深化三大層級AI布局
news.Content:
MoneyDJ新聞 2026-02-10 15:22:59 新聞中心 發佈
智原科技(3035)公佈2025年第四季合併財務報表，單季合併營收28.1億元，季減13%、年減5%；毛利率為42.2%，稅後淨利2.08億元，季增36.8%、年減12.1%，每股盈餘0.8元。2025全年合併營收180億元，年增63%，創歷史新高；毛利率為27%，稅後淨利7.3億元、年減29.8%，每股盈餘2.81元。
回顧第四季，智原指出，IP營收維持平穩，達4.1億元；NRE收入因先進製程項目貢獻，季增89%、年增183%，達9.3億元，創單季歷史新高；量產業務則季減37%、年減33%，達14.7億元；毛利率在產品組合優化下，較上季提升9個百分點至42.2%。
以2025全年來看，IP營收為15.2億元，年減3%；NRE營收22.9億元，再創新高，且連續五年增長；量產營收年增96%，達141.8億元，同步創下歷史新高。值得一提的是，公司不僅在營收規模上顯著成長，業務結構亦呈現質變，先進製程及高階封裝已成為公司主要成長動能，第四季NRE營收中56%來自先進製程，全年佔比達49%，較2024年大幅提升。
智原在先進業務方面持續取得突破，2025年不僅專案數量增加，設計製程亦顯著躍進，帶動委託設計訂單金額較2024年實現翻倍成長，為未來NRE收入注入強勁動能。
在AI佈局方面，智原持續深化「雲、邊、端」三大層級，針對雲端AI，公司聚焦專用型AI加速器及關鍵附屬晶片；在邊緣AI領域，NPU(神經網路處理器)為優化本地推論效能的關鍵，智原已成功完成多項整合NPU專案設計，瞄準既有應用的AI升級及新興應用需求，展現公司在邊緣AI市場的技術實力。而在終端AI方面，MCU結合NPU成為趨勢，智原憑藉完整的開發平台，以快速攫取雲、邊、端全方位的AI ASIC商機。
此外，繼上季成功獲得首個4奈米AI專案後，智原於今年首季再度斬獲5奈米網通晶片專案，同時亦在高階封裝領域贏得另一北美客戶專案，再次證明公司於先進製程的設計實力。
展望未來，公司預期第一季營收將受季節性因素影響出現短期回檔，但對全年營運仍保持樂觀。智原已成功由傳統的ASIC公司進化為能整合多家晶圓代工夥伴及具備高階封裝能力的系統整合者，價值定位也從單純的晶片設計，拓展至系統化的全面整合，強化了公司在產業中的競爭地位。隨著先進製程及高階封裝業務逐步開花結果，有望為中長期成長注入動能。

news.Title: 《半導體》智原2025年每股賺2.81元 NRE、量產營收同創高
news.Content:
【時報記者王逸芯台北報導】智原（3035）今日召開法說會，公布2025年第四季合併財務報表，單季合併營收為新台幣28.1億元，季減13%、年減5%，毛利率為42.2%。歸屬於母公司業主之稅後淨利為新台幣2.1億元，基本每股盈餘為0.80元。累計2025年全年合併營收達新台幣180億元，年增63%，創下歷史新高；毛利率為27.0%，歸屬於母公司業主之稅後淨利為新台幣7.3億元，基本每股盈餘為2.81元。
回顧第四季表現，IP營收維持平穩，達新台幣4.1億元；NRE（委託設計）收入受惠先進製程專案貢獻，季增89%、年增183%，達新台幣9.3億元，創單季歷史新高；量產業務則受出貨節奏影響，季減37%、年減33%，為新台幣14.7億元。在產品組合優化帶動下，單季毛利率較上季大幅提升9個百分點至42.2%。 以2025年全年來看，IP營收為新台幣15.2億元，年減3%；NRE營收達新台幣22.9億元，不僅再創新高，亦連續五年成長；量產營收則年增96%，達新台幣141.8億元，同步刷新歷史紀錄。值得注意的是，公司業務結構已出現明顯轉變，先進製程與高階封裝逐步成為主要成長動能，第四季NRE營收中有56%來自先進製程，全年占比亦達49%，較2024年明顯提升。
在先進製程業務方面，智原持續取得突破。2025年不僅專案數量增加，設計製程節點亦顯著推進，帶動委託設計訂單金額較2024年翻倍成長，為未來NRE收入奠定穩固基礎。在AI布局方面，智原積極深化「雲、邊、端」三大應用領域：在雲端AI方面，聚焦專用型AI加速器及相關附屬晶片；在邊緣AI領域，NPU（神經網路處理器）已成為提升本地推論效能的關鍵，公司已完成多項整合NPU的專案設計，掌握既有應用AI升級與新興應用機會；在終端AI方面，MCU結合NPU已成為發展趨勢，智原憑藉完整開發平台，積極搶攻AI ASIC市場商機。此外，繼上季取得首個4奈米AI專案後，公司於今年第一季再度拿下5奈米網通晶片專案，並於高階封裝領域獲得另一北美客戶訂單，進一步展現其先進製程設計實力。
展望後市，智原預期第一季營收將受季節性因素影響出現短期回檔，但對全年營運仍維持樂觀態度。公司表示，智原已逐步由傳統ASIC設計服務商，轉型為可整合多家晶圓代工夥伴並具備高階封裝能力的系統整合服務商，價值定位從單純晶片設計延伸至系統整合層級，強化整體競爭優勢。隨著先進製程與高階封裝業務持續發酵，將為公司中長期營運成長提供重要支撐。

news.Title: 智原去年每股賺2.81元，估今年首季營收季減一成
news.Content:
【財訊快報／記者李純君報導】IP設計服務公司智原(3035)公布去年第四季成績單，因NRE單季營收創新高、MP業務下滑，致使單季毛利率上升到42.2%，單季歸屬於母公司業主之稅後淨利為2.1億元，基本每股淨利0.80元，累計2025年每股淨利2.81元，展望今年首季，預計營收將季減一成，當三大產線IP成長，但NRE跟MP季減，第一季毛利率目標45%。智原公佈2025年第四季合併財務報表，營收為28.1億元，季減13%，年減5%，毛利率為42.2%，歸屬於母公司業主之稅後淨利為2.1億元，單季每股淨利0.80元。累計2025年全年營收達180億元，年增63%，創歷史新高；毛利率為27.0%，歸屬於母公司業主之稅後淨利為7.3億元，每股淨利2.81元。
回顧第四季，IP營收維持平穩，達4.1億元；NRE收入因先進製程項目貢獻，季增89%，年增183%，達9.3億元，創單季歷史新高；量產業務則季減37%，年減33%，達14.7億元。毛利率在產品組合優化下，較上季提升9個百分點至42.2%。以2025全年來看，IP營收為15.2億元，年減3%；NRE營收為22.9億元，再創新高；量產營收年增96%達141.8億元，同步創下歷史新高。
值得一提的是，先進製程及高階封裝已成為智原主要成長動能，第四季NRE營收中56%來自先進製程，全年佔比達49%，較2024年大幅提升。智原提到，自家在先進業務方面持續取得突破，2025年不僅專案數量增加，設計製程亦顯著躍進，帶動委託設計訂單金額較2024年實現翻倍成長，為未來NRE收入注入強勁動能。
在AI佈局方面，智原持續深化雲、邊、端三大層級：針對雲端AI，公司聚焦專用型AI加速器及關鍵附屬晶片；在邊緣AI領域，NPU(神經網路處理器)為優化本地推論效能的關鍵，智原已成功完成多項整合NPU之專案設計，瞄準既有應用的AI升級及新興應用需求，展現公司在邊緣AI市場的技術實力；而在終端AI方面，MCU結合NPU成為趨勢，智原憑藉完整的開發平台，以快速攫取雲、邊、端全方位之AI ASIC商機。此外，繼上季成功獲得首個4奈米AI專案後，智原於今年首季再度斬獲5奈米網通晶片專案，同時亦在高階封裝領域贏得另一北美客戶專案。
展望未來，智原預期，第一季營收將受季節性因素影響出現短期回檔，但對全年營運仍保持樂觀。智原強調，已成功由傳統的ASIC公司進化為能整合多家晶圓代工夥伴及具備高階封裝能力的系統整合者，公司的價值定位也從單純的晶片設計，拓展至系統化的全面整合，隨著先進製程及高階封裝業務逐步開花結果，有望為公司中長期成長注入動能。

news.Title: 台股站回3萬3、外資加碼557億 三大法人聯手買超630.15億元
news.Content:
台股今 (10) 日早盤在台積電率領下，多頭氣勢如虹，早盤以 32439.71 點開出後便一路震盪走高，一度上漲 600 點。終場在最後一盤拉抬下，收 33072.97 點，上漲 668.35 點，創下史上第 8 大漲點，成功收復 33000 大關，成交量 6565.05 億元；三大法人合計買超 630.15 億元。
觀察三大法人今天籌碼動向，外資買超 557.11 億；自營商買超 28.28 億元；投信買超 44.76 億元；三大法人合計買超 630.15 億元。

news.Title: 台積電雙喜 1月營收衝破4000億元創新高、市值飆上48.75兆元
news.Content:
台積電 (2330-TW)(TSM-US) 今 (10) 日公布 1 月營收達 4012.55 億元，月增 19.78%，年增 36.81%，一舉刷新歷史紀錄，顯見 AI 需求強勁，今日股價也改寫歷史天價，以 1880 元作收，大漲 65 元，市值達 48.75 兆元，同步締新猷。
台積電預估，第一季美元營收 346-358 億美元，依中位數推估，季增 4%，年增 38%，依美元兌 新台幣 匯率 31.6 作為基礎， 新台幣 營收約 1 兆 933 億元至 1 兆 1312 億元，季增 4.5-8.1%。
台積電今年持續受惠 AI 基礎建設擴張，先進製程的 3 奈米與 5 奈米產能依舊緊張，加上先進封裝 CoWoS 產能供不應求，1 月營收再度向上，顯現即便消費性電子需求步入淡季，但對台積電影響仍有限。
台積電看好，今年受惠先進製程、先進封裝需求強勁，公司表現將持續超越市場，預計全年美元營收將成長近 30%，又是強勁成長的一年。

news.Title: 【台股盤後】漲668點衝33072.97點新高
news.Content:
（中央社記者張建中台北2026年02月10日電）台積電 (2330) 今天再創新天價，股價攀高至1880元，帶動台股指數突破33000點關卡，收在33072.97點，同創歷史新高，上漲668.35點，成交值新台幣6565.05億元。
台積電今天股價開高收高，達1880元，創下歷史新高，上漲65元，市值攀高至48.75兆元，貢獻大盤約521點。此外，鴻海 (2317) 、聯發科 (2454) 及日月光投控 (3711) 等權值股同步收漲，推升整體電子類股指數上揚2.66%，為大盤創高一大動能。

微控制器（MCU）廠盛群 (6202) 及雅特力-KY (6907) 在1月營收攀高激勵下，同步強攻漲停，分別達53.7元及53.4元。

傳統產業股漲跌互見，營建類股指數上漲逾1%，表現相對強勢。塑膠類股指數下挫4.88%，玻璃類股指數下跌3.46%，電纜類股指數下跌1.54%，表現相對疲弱。
資深分析師王兆立說，台股蛇年封關倒數計時，指數今天再創新高，台積電是主要動力，也是多頭重要指標。台灣經濟持續穩健成長，有助股市表現。

news.Title: 〈台股盤後〉台積電尾盤登高一呼 狂飆668點衝破3萬3大關收最高
news.Content:
封關倒數兩天，台股今 (10) 日早盤在台積電率領下，多頭氣勢如虹，早盤以 32439.71 點開出後便一路震盪走高，而隨著電子權值股，矽光子、電腦、半導體通路一同發力，一度上漲 600 點，再度站上 33000 點整數大關。終場在最後一盤拉抬下，收 33072.97 點，上漲 668.35 點，創下史上第 8 大漲點，成功收復 33000 大關，成交量 6565.05 億元。
電子權值股為今日撐盤核心，台積電 (2330-TW) 上漲 65 元，漲約 3%，來到 1880 元；聯發科 (2454-TW) 上漲 15 元，漲約 1%，收 1845 元；鴻海 (2317-TW) 、漲約 1%；台達電 (2308-TW)、廣達 (2382-TW) 均於平盤上方。

Lumentumh 財報創新高，矽光子族群買氣沸騰，東典光電 (6588-TW) 漲停板光聖 (6442-TW) 漲約 7%，波若威 (3163-TW) 漲約 5%，上詮 (3363-TW) 漲約 2%。

電子通路股增你強 (3028-TW) 攻上漲停，族群同步走揚，文曄 (3036-TW) 漲約 8%，聯強 (2347-TW) 漲約 2%，大聯大 (3702-TW) 漲約 1%。
PC 族群 1 月業績報喜，一掃頹勢紛紛上攻，華碩 (2357-TW) 漲逾 4%，宏碁 (2353-TW)、微星 (2377-TW) 均漲約 2%，技嘉 (2376-TW) 漲約 1%。

news.Title: 〈台股開盤〉台積電一馬當先創天價1875元 領軍大漲643點衝上3萬3新高
news.Content:
台股今 (21) 日為金蛇年封關倒數第 2 日，受美國科技類股前日表現強勁，加上台積電 (2330-TW) 強漲 60 元達 1,875 元，創新天價下，指數開高走高，一度上漲 643 點，衝上 33,047 點創歷史新高，攻上 3 萬 3 千點大關，盤中暫報 32,900 點，漲 497 點 1.53%，成交量估 8,764 億元。
權值股部分漲跌互見，台積電 (2330-TW) 今日開高走高，漲 3% 以上，一度創新天價達 1,875 元、日月光投控 (3711-TW) 漲 6.26%、欣興 (3037-TW) 漲停板，智邦 (2345-TW) 漲 2.68%、台達電 (2308-TW) 漲 0.42%。

其他包括華邦電 (2344-TW) 跌 3.32% 緯穎 (6669-TW) 漲 0.13%，南亞 (1303-TW) 跌 4.87%、台化 (1326-TW) 跌半根停板、台塑化 (6505-TW) 跌 1.9%。

光通訊股部分，矽光族群受惠今 (2026) 年預期放量出貨，包括波若威 (3163-TW)、東典光電 (6588-TW)、光聖 (6442-TW)、光環 (3234-TW) 一度亮燈漲停。
ABF 載板部分，受惠於供需結構在 AI 與高階運算需求推進，欣興漲停、景碩 (3189-TW) 漲 3.92%、南電 (8046-TW) 漲 3.12%。
法人表示，隨著農曆春節長假在即，影響買盤追價的積極度，指數收復短期均線，大幅化解技術面弱化壓力，預期台股可望維持高檔封關，個股部分依據短期均線多空，可汰弱留強擇優適度持倉。
美股表現方面，道瓊指數 9 日上漲 20.20 點或 0.04%、收在 50,135.87 點；標普 500 上漲 32.52 點或 0.47%、收在 6,964.82 點；那斯達克上漲 207.46 點或 0.9%、收在 23,238.67 點；費城上漲 113.96 點或 1.42%、收在 8,162.58 點。

news.Title: 《櫃買市場券商買超前30名 3-2》波若威(411)、元太(339)
AWS deepens STMicro tie with 24.8 million-share warrant deal
news.Content:
This article first appeared on GuruFocus .

Amazon ( NASDAQ:AMZN ) Web Services appears to be tightening its grip on critical data-center infrastructure by deepening its relationship with STMicroelectronics NV ( NYSE:STM ), as the cloud unit looks to secure a broader range of semiconductor technologies for its hyperscale operations. Under the agreement disclosed on Monday, STMicro will supply AWS with chips supporting high-bandwidth connectivity and energy-efficient power management, components that are increasingly relevant as AI workloads place heavier demands on data-center performance and power efficiency. The structure of the deal suggests AWS is positioning itself not just as a customer, but as a long-term partner as global data-center build-outs accelerate.

Warning! GuruFocus has detected 2 Warning Sign with AMZN.

Is AMZN fairly valued? Test your thesis with our free DCF calculator.

Alongside the commercial supply arrangement, AWS received warrants to acquire up to 24.8 million ordinary STMicro shares, with vesting linked to AWS's purchases of STMicro products over time. The warrants can be exercised over a seven-year period at an initial exercise price of $28.38, giving AWS the flexibility to build an equity position in stages. STMicro shares rose 6.5% at the market open to $26.51 following the announcement, while for AWS the move represents at least its second investment in a semiconductor company, reinforcing the view that cloud operators could increasingly blend procurement and capital allocation to secure strategic supply.

The backdrop to the agreement is a widening semiconductor opportunity driven by AI-related data-center investment, where demand is extending beyond advanced processors into analog chips used for power management, sensing, and cooling. STMicro, which supplies customers such as Tesla ( NASDAQ:TSLA ) and Apple Inc. ( NASDAQ:AAPL ), recently forecast first-quarter revenue that came in above analysts' expectations, with consumer electronics demand showing signs of recovery late last year after a prolonged slump. At the same time, management has cautioned that the rebound remains uneven, with Chief Executive Officer Jean-Marc Chery noting that the automotive market is not yet stable, suggesting that AI-driven infrastructure demand could be an important, though not uniform, support for the company's outlook.

news.Title: AMAT to Post Q1 Earnings: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
news.Content:
Applied Materials AMAT is scheduled to report first-quarter fiscal 2026 results on Feb. 12.

For the fiscal first quarter, AMAT expects revenues to be $6.85 billion (+/- $500 million). The Zacks Consensus Estimate for revenues is pegged at $6.89 billion, suggesting a decline of 3.87% from the year-ago quarter’s reading.

Applied Materials projects non-GAAP earnings to be $2.18 (+/- $0.20). The Zacks Consensus Estimate for earnings is pegged at $2.19 per share, indicating a decline of 7.98% from the year-ago quarter’s reported figure. The figure has remained unchanged in the past 60 days.

Image Source: Zacks Investment Research

AMAT has an impressive earnings surprise history. AMAT beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate in each of the past four quarters, with an average earnings surprise of 4.17%.

Applied Materials, Inc. price-eps-surprise | Applied Materials, Inc. Quote

Our proven model predicts an earnings beat for AMAT this earnings season. The combination of a positive Earnings ESP and a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), 2 (Buy) or 3 (Hold) increases the chances of an earnings beat, which is the case here.

Earnings ESP: Earnings ESP, which represents the difference between the Most Accurate Estimate ($2.26 per share) and the Zacks Consensus Estimate ($2.19 per share), is +3.06%. You can uncover the best stocks to buy or sell before they are reported with our Earnings ESP Filter.

Zacks Rank: AMAT carries a Zacks Rank #2 at present. You can see the complete list of today’s Zacks #1 Rank stocks here .

AMAT’s wafer fabrication equipment (WFE) is experiencing increased demand due to a rise in the usage of semiconductors in artificial intelligence and high performance computing (HPC). In the previous quarter, AMAT reported that its leading-edge foundry/logic, DRAM and advanced packaging will be the fastest-growing areas of the WFE market.

AMAT’s flash memory or NAND sales nearly doubled to $1.41 billion in fiscal 2025 from the year-ago sales of $747.4 million. Although AMAT has a lower market share in the NAND space, it is gaining prominence. This trend is likely to have persisted in the to-be-reported quarter, supporting AMAT’s top-line growth.

Applied Materials’ leadership in GAA transistors at 2nm and below, Backside power delivery, Advanced wiring and interconnect, HBM stacking and hybrid bonding and 3D device metrology, which are indispensable for manufacturing next-generation semiconductor chips, are likely to have driven AMAT’s semiconductor segment in the fiscal first quarter.

AMAT’s display business has rebounded in the fiscal 2025 with year-over-year growth of 19.8%. In the fourth quarter of fiscal 2025, the display revenues grew 68.2% year over year as Applied Materials shipped a richer mix of advanced systems and increased prices broadly. These factors are likely to have benefited AMAT’s corporate and other segment’s revenues.

The company’s Applied Global Services segment is also likely to have seen steady growth, aided by strong demand for comprehensive service agreements and the expansion of its subscription-based business.

Applied Materials shares have gained 74.9% over the past six months, outperforming the Zacks Electronics – Semiconductors industry, which has gained 19.4%.

Image Source: Zacks Investment Research

Let us now look at the value Applied Materials offers to its investors at current levels. AMAT is currently trading at a premium with a forward 12-month price-to-sales (P/S) of 8.46X compared with the industry’s 8.26X.

Image Source: Zacks Investment Research

Applied Materials operates in a highly competitive market space where it faces competition from players, including Lam Research LRCX in the semiconductor space, ASML Holding ASML in the photolithography and advanced manufacturing equipment segment. KLA Corporation KLAC is a dominant competitor in the wafer inspection space.

For instance, Lam Research develops Atomic Layer Deposition tools like AT200M, AT410 and AT650P that are similar to the devices made by AMAT. Both ASML and AMAT specialize in advanced semiconductor nodes, although developing solutions for various stages of semiconductor production. ASML Holding develops lithography solutions, including EXE and NXE systems.

Applied Materials and KLA Corporation offer similar solutions, such as Wafer Inspection, Yield Enhancement and Process Control inspection systems. KLA Corporation develops inspection systems, including 3935 and 3920 EP broadband plasma defect inspection systems. Although Applied Materials is dealing with a broader market sell-off and growing competition, not everything is gloom and doom for the company.

Applied Materials leads the market with its superior design wins. It is well-positioned to capitalize on the technology-inflection-led growing demand for next-generation chips on the back of its product innovations and leadership in leading-edge logic, compute memory, high bandwidth memory and advanced packaging.

AMAT is likely to capitalize on AI-driven semiconductor demand. The company has made significant strides in cutting-edge chip manufacturing, particularly in gate-all-around (GAA) transistors, high-bandwidth memory and advanced packaging. These innovations are critical to enabling faster, more energy-efficient AI processing.

AMAT is gaining from continuous strength across wafer fabrication equipment for foundry/logic, DRAM, NAND, flash memory, GAA and advanced packaging driven by increased usage of semiconductors in artificial intelligence and HPC. AMAT’s HBM stacking and hybrid bonding and 3D device metrology technologies are indispensable for manufacturing next-generation semiconductor chips. Considering these factors, we suggest investors buy this stock now.

news.Title: Cirrus Logic, Inc. (CRUS) Soars to 52-Week High, Time to Cash Out?
news.Content:
Have you been paying attention to shares of Cirrus Logic (CRUS) ? Shares have been on the move with the stock up 17.3% over the past month. The stock hit a new 52-week high of $144.76 in the previous session. Cirrus Logic has gained 20.5% since the start of the year compared to the -0.6% move for the Zacks Computer and Technology sector and the 3.2% return for the Zacks Electronics - Semiconductors industry.

The stock has a great record of positive earnings surprises, having beaten the Zacks Consensus Estimate in each of the last four quarters. In its last earnings report on February 3, 2026, Cirrus Logic reported EPS of $2.97 versus consensus estimate of $2.42.

For the current fiscal year, Cirrus Logic is expected to post earnings of $8.51 per share on $1.94 in revenues. This represents a 12.86% change in EPS on a 2.35% change in revenues. For the next fiscal year, the company is expected to earn $8.77 per share on $2.03 in revenues. This represents a year-over-year change of 3.03% and 4.48%, respectively.

Though Cirrus Logic has recently hit a 52-week high, what is next for Cirrus Logic? A key aspect of this question is taking a look at valuation metrics in order to determine if the company is due for a pullback from this level.

On this front, we can look at the Zacks Style Scores, as they provide investors with an additional way to sort through stocks (beyond looking at the Zacks Rank of a security). The individual style scores for Value, Growth, Momentum and the combined VGM Score run from A through F. Investors should consider the style scores a valuable tool that can help you to pick the most appropriate Zacks Rank stocks based on their individual investment style.

Cirrus Logic has a Value Score of C. The stock's Growth and Momentum Scores are A and A, respectively, giving the company a VGM Score of A.

In terms of its value breakdown, the stock currently trades at 16.8X current fiscal year EPS estimates, which is not in-line with the peer industry average of 37.6X. On a trailing cash flow basis, the stock currently trades at 19.4X versus its peer group's average of 23.4X. This isn't enough to put the company in the top echelon of all stocks we cover from a value perspective.

We also need to look at the Zacks Rank for the stock, as this supersedes any trend on the style score front. Fortunately, Cirrus Logic currently has a Zacks Rank of #1 (Strong Buy) thanks to rising earnings estimates.

Since we recommend that investors select stocks carrying Zacks Rank of 1 (Strong Buy) or 2 (Buy) and Style Scores of A or B, it looks as if Cirrus Logic fits the bill. Thus, it seems as though Cirrus Logic shares could still be poised for more gains ahead.

Shares of CRUS have been soaring, and the company still appears to be a decent choice, but what about the rest of the industry? One industry peer that looks good is Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) . AMAT has a Zacks Rank of #2 (Buy) and a Value Score of D, a Growth Score of B, and a Momentum Score of A.

Earnings were strong last quarter. Applied Materials, Inc. beat our consensus estimate by 2.84%, and for the current fiscal year, AMAT is expected to post earnings of $9.62 per share on revenue of $29.17 billion.

Shares of Applied Materials, Inc. have gained 7.1% over the past month, and currently trade at a forward P/E of 33.53X and a P/CF of 31.95X.

The Electronics - Semiconductors industry is in the top 25% of all the industries we have in our universe, so it looks like there are some nice tailwinds for CRUS and AMAT, even beyond their own solid fundamental situation.

news.Title: Best-Performing Leveraged ETFs of Last Week
news.Content:
Wall Street offered a muted performance last week. The S&P 500 lost 0.1%, the Dow Jones added 2.5%, and the Nasdaq Composite retreated 1.8%. The key event of the week was the tech stock rout. Wall Street has been skeptical about software stocks in recent times, but a phase of outright panic hit last week.

Traders dumped shares across the sector as fears mount that artificial intelligence (AI) could fundamentally disrupt software-as-a-service (SaaS) business models.The anxiety intensified on Feb. 3, 2026, after AI startup Anthropic unveiled a productivity tool aimed at in-house lawyers. The announcement triggered a sharp selloff in legal software and publishing stocks, per Bloomberg, as quoted on Yahoo Finance.

Meanwhile, six out of all Mag 7 members have reported their Q4 results, with just NVDA remaining. Alphabet and Amazon reported last week.Amazon missed EPS estimates, but the business is otherwise in great shape.

Amazon plans to spend $200 billion in capital expenditures in 2026, up from $132 billion in 2025 and $83 billion in 2024. While Amazon remains the cloud leader, the Alphabet report showed accelerating momentum at the search giant’s Google Cloud business (read: Amazon Drops on Mixed Q4 & Capex Outlook: Buy the Dip With ETFs?).

In a nutshell, combining the actual results for the six Magnificent 7 members that have reported already along with estimates for Nvidia, total Q4 earnings for the group are expected to be up 24.2% from the same period last year on 18.9% higher revenues, which would follow the group’s 28.3% earnings growth on 18.1% revenue growth in 2025 Q3, per Zacks Earnings Trends.

Against this backdrop, below we highlight the winning leveraged ETFs of last week.

Tradr 2X Long LITE Daily ETF LITX – Up 79.5%

Lumentum Holdings Inc LITE stock surged 36.3% last week on the earnings strength. Lumentum's Q1 2026 revenues rose 58% year over year to $533.8 million, topping estimates by 1.43%. Non-GAAP EPS of $1.10 beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 6.8%, driven by AI and cloud strength. The company offered an upbeat outlook, too.

Tradr 2X Long ENPH Daily ETF ENPX – Up 67.7%

Enphase Energy ENPH shares rose 35.8% last week. Enphase last weekreported fourth-quarter 2025 adjusted earnings of 71 cents per share, which topped the Zacks Consensus Estimate of 54 cents by 31.5%.Enphase Energy’s fourth-quarter revenues of $343.3 million beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $335 million by 2.6%.

Tradr 2X Short IREN Daily ETF IREZ – Up 37.1%

IREN Ltd IREN lost about 20.1% last week, lending a surge to the double-leveraged IREN ETF. Last week, IREN came with a Q2 FY26 loss of 44 cents per share as revenues slid 23.1% sequentially and missed estimates. Total revenues fell 23.1% sequentially to $184.7 million, missing the consensus estimate by 16.49%. Bitcoin revenues fell 28.2% quarter on quarter. However, AI cloud services revenues jumped 137% from the prior quarter.

T-Rex 2X Long ARM Daily Target ETF ARMU) – Up 35.0%

Arm Holdings ARM gained about 18% last week. The stock gained on a strong fiscal third-quarter 2026 earnings report released on Feb. 4, 2026. The stock gained as investors focused on strong growth in AI and data center segments.

news.Title: Prediction: This Chip Stock Could Be a Top Performer by 2027
news.Content:
When investors look at investing in computer chips to take advantage of the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution, they are likely to start with a company like Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) . That makes sense, given that it makes the most popular chips for handling AI workloads. However, there's another chip stock that could also turn out to be a huge AI winner: Texas Instruments (NASDAQ: TXN) .

Nvidia makes high-powered parallel processing chips that act as the primary brains that undergird AI software. Texas Instruments makes analog chips, the boring ones that convert physical events into digital signals. When you push a button on a digital device, it is likely being controlled by an analog chip. Texas Instruments' chips are simple, relatively low cost, and can be found in tech products virtually everywhere.

Where to invest $1,000 right now? Our analyst team just revealed what they believe are the 10 best stocks to buy right now, when you join Stock Advisor. See the stocks »

In the artificial intelligence hardware world, Texas Instruments' chips provide power management. That's a vital function within the data centers that house AI. Given the expectation that the AI infrastructure buildout is only just beginning, Texas Instruments could have years of growth ahead of it in this end market.

Over the last few years, the analog chip sector has been in a rut. However, Texas Instruments has been investing in new chip production capacity. Just recently, it agreed to buy competitor Silicon Labs (NASDAQ: SLAB) . In other words, Texas Instruments is preparing for growth.

It is also shifting the way it reports its sales. In the fourth quarter of 2025, the company broke out its data center business as a separate end market. The segment accounted for around 9% of the top line. However, it grew 64% year over year in the fourth quarter.

That's probably not a number to bake into your growth expectations, given that the AI opportunity is brand new. Still, revenue rose by a mid-single-digit percentage from the third quarter. If this is just the beginning of the AI buildout, this segment could help supercharge an upturn in the typically cyclical analog chip sector and support growth for years to come.

There are other analog chipmakers , and there are chipmakers that make more exciting chips than Texas Instruments. However, for most investors, opening a position in this industry-leading company will probably set you up for long-term success. And given the strength of the business and the company's growth efforts, the AI buildout could easily turn Texas Instruments into a top-performing chipmaker by 2027, if not sooner.

news.Title: 法人買盤回歸 台積電狂飆台股強彈621點/記憶體面板CPO紅燈排排站 資金狂湧/金馬年布局攻略 AI依舊最香？｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
美國市場在輝達等AI晶片股強勢反彈，以及科技巨擘持續擴大AI資本支出帶動信心回溫，激勵美股全面走強，道瓊大漲2.47%，創歷史收盤新高，那斯達克上漲2.18%，標普500指數上漲1.97%，費城半導體指數更強彈5.7%；其中輝達飆升7.92%，帶動AMD、博通、美光等AI供應鏈同步上攻，台積電ADR亦大漲5.48%，反映市場對AI基礎建設需求持續擴張的期待。不過亞馬遜因財報表現分歧且資本支出大幅提高，股價重挫5.55%，顯示市場仍在成長與獲利壓力間拉鋸。
亞股在美股強勢帶動下同步回神，日股大漲3.89%，日本大選結果出爐、政治不確定性降低，提振市場信心；韓股上漲4.1%，港股走揚，上證指數小漲，區域市場氣氛明顯轉暖。
回到台股，在美股大漲與AI族群回溫激勵下，加權指數終場大漲621.70點、收32,404.62點，成交金額6,319.52億元；權王 台積電(2330) 大漲35元成為推升指數重返3萬2的重要關鍵， 聯發科(2454) 同步強勢上攻，高價股 台光電(2383) 、 日月光投控(3711) 等漲勢亮眼，盤面以AI、CPO與記憶體族群為多頭主旋律，顯示資金仍集中於具長線成長題材的電子股，帶動市場人氣回溫。
📝盤點熱門股：力積電、群創、燿華 今日熱門成交股方面，成交量集中於記憶體與面板族群。記憶體族群 力積電(6770) 在春節前卡位記憶體題材帶動下成交量居冠，股價走揚，市場聚焦產業循環與抱股過年布局； 華邦電(2344) 同步走強，反映市場對記憶體報價與後續營運展望的期待。
面板族群則由 群創(3481) 、 友達(2409) 雙雙擠進成交量前段，但在開高後震盪整理下皆呈小跌，分析師指出面板雙虎短線面臨高檔壓力，市場資金以區間操作為主。至於PCB廠 燿華(2367) 則因先前強勢漲勢吸引短線資金換手，成交放大但收平盤，分析師認為股價位階已高，買賣力道拉鋸使漲幅收斂，整體顯示盤面資金偏好高題材、高波動個股進行短線操作。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計買超361.51億元，其中外資為主要推手，單日買超247.69億元，顯示資金明顯回補；自營商同步偏多操作，買超106.77億元；投信則小幅買超7.05億元。分析師指出，外資回流帶動市場信心回溫，在封關前資金面仍維持偏多氛圍，短線行情可望延續。
✨本日議題股：矽光子概念股 矽光子概念股再度成為盤面焦點，AI伺服器與高速傳輸需求帶動光通訊族群全面轉強，資金集中點火下，多檔個股亮燈齊揚，其中 波若威(3163) 即便列為處置股「關禁閉」，仍強勢鎖漲停，顯示市場對後續營收與獲利成長抱持高度期待， 華星光(4979) 同步攻高，帶動 光聖(6442) 、 聯亞(3081) 等族群人氣升溫。分析師指出，市場在處置期間仍積極追價，反映...... 點我看更多
👥金馬年布局： 隨著封關將近，市場也開始聚焦「金馬年」投資布局。法人指出，AI仍是長線核心主軸，科技巨頭持續擴大資本支出，帶動產業機會從晶片與算力延伸至資料中心基礎建設與電力相關族群，成為後續關注焦點。此外，在利率政策不確定下...... 點我看更多

台灣方面，行程聚焦股東會與法說，股東會包括 同泰(3321) 、 光耀(3666) 、 合水先進(7857) ；法說會可優先關注 華邦電(2344) 、 友達(2409) 、 智原(3035) 、 譜瑞-KY(4966) 、 中光電(5371) 、 盛群(6202) 、 致新(8081) 等大廠釋出的庫存調整、需求回溫與毛利展望；另有現增題材包含 佳能(2374) 、 精確(3162) 、 成信實業*-創(6969) 、 來思達(8066) ，資金面與籌碼變化也可能帶動個股短線波動。

news.Title: 外資封關前回補247億元 青睞金融股、持續砍出面板雙虎
news.Content:
台股封關倒數，在台積電帶動下今 (9) 日暴力反彈，終場大漲 621.7 點或 1.96%，成為台股史上第十大漲點，以 32404.62 點作收，成交量 6308.8 億元。外資今天回頭買超 247.69 億元，並青睞多檔金融股，不過再大舉砍出群創及友達。
三大法人今天同站買方，外資在連 2 日賣超後，今天回補 247.69 億元；投信買超 7.05 億元，2 月以來連續 6 個交易日買超；自營商今天也轉為買方，買超 106.78 億元，三大法人合計買超 361.51 億元。

外資今天偏愛金融族群，敲進多檔金融股，買超凱基金 6.2 萬張，台新新光金 3.5 萬張，永豐金 1.4 萬張，國泰金 1.2 萬張，三商壽 9103 張。此外，也買超旺宏 3.2 萬張，南亞 2.4 萬張，光寶科 1.1 萬張，華航 9476 張，中鋼 9366 張。

外資今天也買超多檔 ETF，買超 00878 國泰永續高股息 3.9 萬張，0050 元大台灣 50 3.6 萬張，00990A 主動元大 AI 新經濟 3.3 萬張，00919 群益台灣精選高息 2.1 萬張，00918A 主動統一台股增長 1.3 萬張。
上周面板雙虎慘遭外資瘋狂倒貨，上周賣超友達 7.7 萬張、群創 6.5 萬張，今天減碼力道未歇，再度賣超群創 5.8 萬張、友達 3 萬張。此外，也賣超力積電 5.1 萬張，燿華 3.2 萬張，台玻 2.1 萬張，聯合再生 1.3 萬張，華通 1.2 萬張，南亞科 1.2 萬張，欣興 1.1 萬張，聯電 9539 張。
投信今天青睞記憶體，買超華邦電最多，達 2480 張，也同步加碼南亞科 1965 張、旺宏 1887 張及力積電 760 張。其他個股部分，包含欣興、華航、長榮航、矽格、日月光以及華通都進到投信買超前十名。
投信賣超則瞄準金融族群減碼，與外資對作，賣超台新新光金 4434 張，凱基金 3082 張，玉山金 1675 張，中信金 1659 張，永豐金 877 張。另外，也減碼聯電、精成科、華新、貿聯 - KY 以及南亞。

news.Title: What Are Wall Street Analysts' Target Price for NXP Semiconductors Stock?
news.Content:
Headquartered in Eindhoven, the Netherlands, NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NXPI) designs and delivers advanced chips across processors, connectivity, analog, security, and sensor technologies. With a market cap of roughly $56.5 billion, the company forms the invisible backbone of vehicles, factories, Internet of Things (IoT) ecosystems, mobile devices, and modern communications infrastructure.

While the business footprint looks expansive, stock performance has introduced a more restrained narrative. Over the past 52 weeks, NXPI stock gained 3.5%, trailing the S&P 500 Index ($SPX) 14% gain. Year-to-date (YTD), however, the stock rose 3.3%, edging past the broader index’s modest 1.3% increase.

Inflation, Earnings and Other Key Things to Watch this Week

Why Alphabet's Free Cash Flow Could Survive, Despite the Market's Fears - How to Play GOOGL

Should You Buy AT&T Stock After Its Amazon Leo Win?

Get exclusive insights with the FREE Barchart Brief newsletter. Subscribe now for quick, incisive midday market analysis you won't find anywhere else.

Placing that performance within the sector sharpens perspective. The State Street SPDR S&P Semiconductor ETF (XSD) surged 45.3% over the same 52-week period and added 11.6% YTD.

On Feb. 2, NXP Semiconductors reported its Q4 2025 earnings results, immediately lifting the stock 2.2%. Revenue grew 7.2% year over year to $3.34 billion, topping the $3.3 billion analyst estimates. Adjusted EPS rose 5.3% to $3.35, clearing Wall Street’s $3.30 forecast with room to spare.

Despite beating headline estimates, NXPI stock slid 4.5% in the next trading session as investors focused on elevated inventories and emerging signs of long-term margin pressure. However, management countered with a strategic reset anchored in “physical artificial intelligence (AI),” emphasizing accelerating demand for industrial products with built-in intelligence at the edge.

Leadership also cited stronger regional manufacturing amid geopolitical pressure. As automakers stop trimming orders and inventory correction fades, management now sees visibility into growth from next-generation, AI-enabled products.

The outlook carries into the forward estimates. For fiscal year 2026, ending in December, analysts project diluted EPS of $12.37, implying 21.3% year-over-year growth. Importantly, NXP Semiconductors has beaten EPS expectations in three of the past four quarters, missing only once.

Wall Street sentiment remains firmly supportive, assigning NXPI stock an overall “Strong Buy” rating. Out of 30 analysts, 22 rate NXPI stock a “Strong Buy,” two recommend “Moderate Buy,” and six suggest “Hold.”

Importantly, the outlook remains unchanged from three months ago, when 22 analysts also labeled the stock a “Strong Buy.”

While NXPI stock has lagged peers from a growth standpoint, recent demand commentary appears stronger than that of many competitors. Reinforcing this view, TD Cowen raised its price target to $285 from $260 on Jan. 16 while maintaining a “Buy” rating on the stock.

Looking ahead, analyst targets paint a clearer picture of what the market believes the stock can deliver. NXPI’s average price target of $259.67 implies potential upside of 15.8%. Meanwhile, the Street-high target of $324.40 suggests a gain of 44.6% from current levels.

news.Title: 《台股盤後》量縮收漲621點，收復10日線/32K
news.Content:
MoneyDJ新聞 2026-02-09 16:04:23 新聞中心 發佈
美股四大指數上週五全面揚升，搭配日本自民黨在眾院大選大勝、激勵今(9)日早盤亞洲股市及美股電子盤呈強勢表現，帶動台股開盤即展現強勁氣勢；由ADR漲勢帶動的台積電、外資調高評等的聯發科/日月光投控、1月營收亮眼的智邦/台化及南亞強勢領軍，搭配台達電等電子權值股、塑膠/電機機械/記憶體概念股的助攻，推升加權指數一度大漲逾880點，不過午盤日經225及美股電子盤漲勢鈍化，加上台股上週五呈V型拉升、本周又將進入長假，尾盤相對出現獲利調節賣壓，終場加權指數收在32404.62點，飆漲621.70點或1.96%，順利站回5日線、10日線與收復32K，成交量則縮減至6308.80億元。

輝達等AI晶片股強彈，抵銷亞馬遜的疲弱走勢，美國四大指數6日全面跳漲，其中道瓊工業平均指數更首度站上5萬點整數關卡、創收盤新高。亞洲股市方面，因高市早苗領導的自民黨在眾院大選中獲得歷史性大勝、市場期待政權穩定有助於高市推動政策，日本半導體相關股飆漲，激勵日經225指數終場漲3.89%；韓股由科技股領漲，KOSPI指數收漲4.10%。

台股今日止跌回升，收盤大漲逾621點、站穩32400點整數關卡。電子及半導體類股表現強勢，台積電盤初追平歷史高點1835元，終場收在最低點1815元、上漲1.97%，聯發科盤中創新天價1870元，終場收漲7%，台光電、日月光投控、致茂連袂走揚。記憶體族群同樣獲得資金青睞，旺宏、華邦電、宜鼎、廣穎、宇瞻、凌航同步亮燈漲停，南亞科、品安、群聯、威剛收紅。
塑膠類股在台化鎖漲停及南亞勁揚6%的帶動下、今日漲幅為19大類股中最高/達5.4%，同時聯成、華夏、國喬也有不錯表現，不過玻璃陶瓷族群則面臨沉重賣壓、表現最弱勢/收跌5.8%，主要係台玻股價開高走低，終場重挫逾6%；綠能環保、生技醫療族群亦表現乏力。
三大法人動向方面，今日三大法人總計買超361.51億元；其中，外資及陸資(不含外資自營商)買超247.69億元，投信買超7.05億元，自營商買超106.78億元。

news.Title: 產線供不應求！世界先進傳4月調漲代工價10-15%，年度第二波漲價
news.Content:
【財訊快報／記者李純君報導】成熟製程代工又傳漲價了，業界傳出，去年第四季調漲今年第一季成熟代工製程的世界先進(5347)，因為產線全滿，且部分產線供給吃緊，已經在近日又通知客戶，將自今年第二季起啟動第二波調漲。事實上，世界先進去年第四季就已經通知客戶漲價，主要調漲的產線，電源管理晶片和分離式元件等，漲幅約在高個位數百分比，調漲的客戶主要是IDM廠。
而近日半導體圈則是傳出，法說會後，世界先進再度啟動漲價，通知客戶四月起，將第二波全面調漲代工價格，調漲幅度達10%到15%。這是世界先進今年內出現第二次的漲價動作，主因包括產線滿載，且甚至部分產線供給吃緊，加上上游原物料成本上揚等。
世界先進近日法說會上，公司針對漲價議題，回應謹慎且相對保守，董座方略表示，公司延續策略合作，在供應鏈上與客戶共同協調，並視投資與產能擴充需要進行合理價格調整，以建立長期互惠雙贏關係，避免單方面通知式調價。市場並無獲得直接且肯定的回應，市場出現失望氛圍，加上世界先進股價短線漲幅大，法說會後隔日跌停。

news.Title: 力積電員工認股權憑證於114年第四季行使所發行之普通股已上市25,036,599股
news.Content:
公開資訊觀測站公告
(6770)力積電-力晶積成電子製造股份有限公司（公司代號：6770）員工認股權憑證於114年第4季行使所發行之普通股股票已上市股數。
一、上市股票代號：6770。
二、上市股票數量：普通股25,036,599股。
三、上開公司已於115年1月8日將相關資訊公告於公開資訊觀測站。
四、其他：本次申報上市之普通股股票新竹科學園區管理局核准變更登記日期為115年02月04日，加計本次發行普通股後之變更登記普通股股數餘額為4,225,361,900股。(含私募及限制買賣股數計0股)

news.Title: Why I am still taking these tech stocks to task
news.Content:
This is The Takeaway from today's Morning Brief, which you can sign up to receive in your inbox every morning along with:

What we're watching

What we're reading

Economic data releases and earnings

If you are looking to be consoled after 25% in value was sliced off your software stock holdings this week, then click out of this and go about your day.

Because I'm not here to offer up sloppy kisses and warm hugs. I'm in a mood to dish out some pain on two fronts. One is to you — the investors I love so much — as these painful losses could have been avoided. All you had to do was what I have suggested time and time again: take frequent pulse checks in the companies you own.

So many software stocks were priced for perfection (and still are) coming into the year, and the backdrop was far from perfect. AI updates out of Anthropic ( ANTH.PVT ) and Google ( GOOG , GOOGL ) are calling into question the long-term value of software companies.

Meanwhile, these stocks were bid up to aggressive valuations in part because of hopes of additional interest rate cuts. Well, Fed Chair Jerome Powell told you last week those weren't coming anytime soon. And the Kevin Warsh announcement as Fed chair nominee hasn't helped matters.

The entire software investment thesis has been blown up.

I also want to hand out pain to a few tech companies that I lightly touched on during Opening Bid late in the week.

First, Qualcomm ( QCOM ).

Qualcomm's guidance stunk, and the sell-off on Thursday was deserved. The company called out weakness in the smartphone market, largely due to the global memory chip shortage. Execs said this dynamic could persist into 2027.

An outlook like this should have been teed up by management three months ago. Come on, guys, do better!

Expect Qualcomm shares to stay in the penalty box.

"Smartphone headwinds an ongoing concern; AI chip potential still unclear," HSBC analyst Frank Lee said.

The next tech giant in line is chip player Arm Holdings ( ARM ).

Arm also served up some less-than-savory guidance, blaming memory chip shortages. Keep in mind that Arm designs the architecture that forms ⁠the basis of a large chunk of the ‌world's smartphone chips. That leaves it with the prospect of subdued royalty sales amid soft mobile processor sales.

Similar to what I just said about Qualcomm, Arm execs should've done a better job guiding investors to these challenges.

Instead, investors in both companies are left holding the bag. Arm shares are also likely to stay in the penalty box.

And I know you want me to lay into Alphabet ( GOOG , GOOGL ) for shocking the hell out of everyone by calling out up to $185 billion in capital expenditures this year. The Street estimate was around $120 billion.

But I'm not going to lay into Alphabet for one simple reason: The fundamentals of its business are so strong that you can justify this level of spending. Check out these two random numbers I yanked from the earnings call transcript .

In October, YouTube viewers watched more than 700 million hours of podcasts on living room devices, up 75% from a year ago.

The company has 8 million paid seats of Gemini Enterprise, which it launched just four months ago. And the Gemini app now has more than 750 million monthly active users. These are huge numbers that should have OpenAI ( OPAI.PVT ) quaking in its boots.

"The quarter strengthen thesis that: 1) Google search activity will accelerate from new AI use cases (not losing queries to OpenAI), 2) AI can structurally drive higher Search monetization, 3) Gemini large language models and TPUs are cloud competitive advantages, and 4) Cloud capex is high return on investment, and more capacity will accelerate cloud growth," BofA analyst Justin Post said.

Is this coming week one where you bottom-hunt in software? I will leave you with this thought: Have you ever tried catching a falling knife with bare hands? My point exactly.

I've had the good fortune of being in finance in various capacities for 22 years. And a lot of you remember when I was an analyst writing research reports and making stock calls. I appreciate you riding with me all these years. You have told me lately that you miss me picking stocks.

I feel you, but this is a different point in my life and career. However, I will try to do a better job at whipping up short analyses when possible on stocks that leave an impression on me one way or another.

To that end...

Hailey Bieber's power to drive the cosmetics industry seemingly has no bounds.

That's one of my thoughts as I reran the numbers this week on e.l.f. Beauty's ( ELF ) latest quarter, which was powered by the company spending $1 billion to buy Bieber's cosmetics brand, Rhode, last August. E.l.f. hiked its top- and bottom-line outlooks for the year because of momentum with Rhode, but also because of new shelf space wins at Walmart ( WMT ) and Dollar General ( DG ).

Yet the stock sold off by 6% on Thursday. It's off by 63% from the February 2024 highs.

I don't love the cosmetics industry. It's volatile, competitive, and very hit-driven. But I will say this: The Street could be missing things a little on e.l.f.

I liked what CEO Tarang Amin told me about demand trends for Rhode on Opening Bid and how the core business of lower-priced cosmetics is performing at major retailers. I also like that the company has gained a lot of new shelf space at those aforementioned two retailers, as well as Target ( TGT ).

Take that for what it is.

Brian Sozzi is Yahoo Finance's Executive Editor and a member of Yahoo Finance's editorial leadership team. Follow Sozzi on X @BrianSozzi , Instagram , and LinkedIn . Tips on stories? Email brian.sozzi@yahoofinance.com.

news.Title: New Street Upgrades Arm Holdings (ARM) to Buy Following Strong Royalty Performance
news.Content:
Arm Holdings (NASDAQ:ARM) is one of the worst AI stocks to invest in according to Reddit . On February 5, New Street analyst Pierre Ferragu upgraded Arm Holdings to Buy from Neutral.

However, on the same day, Jefferies lowered its price target for Arm Holdings to $170 from $205 with a Buy rating. Despite strong results and guidance, the firm noted that Arm’s shares faced pressure due to investor concerns that rising memory prices could reduce smartphone sales volumes. However, the firm clarified that while price hikes primarily affect the low-to-mid-end market, Arm’s growth is driven by high-end smartphone chips that utilize v9 and CSS architectures.

KeyBanc also lowered its price target for Arm Holdings (NASDAQ:ARM) to $170 from $200 and kept an Overweight rating, despite the company delivering strong Q3 2025 results and raising its Q4 guidance. The firm noted that Arm exceeded expectations in both royalties and licensing, but management acknowledged that rising memory prices and supply shortages are expected to dampen handset royalty growth.

Pixabay/Public Domain

Arm Holdings (NASDAQ:ARM) architects, develops, and licenses central processing unit products and related technologies for semiconductor companies and original equipment manufacturers.

While we acknowledge the potential of ARM as an investment, we believe certain AI stocks offer greater upside potential and carry less downside risk. If you’re looking for an extremely undervalued AI stock that also stands to benefit significantly from Trump-era tariffs and the onshoring trend, see our free report on the best short-term AI stock .

news.Title: 鐘崑禎記憶體唱主調 聚焦三要素
news.Content:
台股上周經歷了一場令人心跳加速的壓力測試，摩爾投顧分析師鐘崑禎指出，本周將進入農曆封關前的最後交易周，當部分個股出現非理性超跌時，就是聰明資金進場掃貨的好時機。本周投組持續「All in」記憶體，首選力積電（6770）、群聯（8299），再加入旺宏（2337）、南亞科（2408）及華邦電（2344）。
台股加權指數在短短五個交易日內，出現了兩次單日重挫500點的殺盤，隨即又出現單日飆漲500點的報復性反彈。這種極端且劇烈的「大洗刷」，在技術分析上被稱為「擴散喇叭型」整理，通常發生在主升段發動前的最後清洗浮額階段。
雖然記憶體族群在這次震盪中首當其衝，但我們必須釐清一點：股價的修正來自於市場情緒的恐慌，而非產業基本面的惡化。
隨著本周即將進入農曆封關前的最後交易周，市場觀望氣氛濃厚是必然的。但我認為，這正是贏家與輸家的分水嶺。大多數散戶會選擇賣股過年，導致股價出現非理性的超跌；而聰明的法人資金則會利用這段時間低檔掃貨，布局年後的「開紅盤行情」。總體經濟數據顯示，美國經濟軟著陸已成定局，聯準會降息路徑清晰，這意味著年後的資金狂潮將會比年前更加猛烈。
目前的記憶體產業具備了三大飆漲要素：第一，供給缺口擴大：三大原廠將產能移轉至HBM，導致標準型DRAM與NAND Flash產能受到排擠，庫存水位已降至健康水位以下；第二，報價漲勢確立：合約價與現貨價同步走揚，且漲勢已從上游顆粒擴散至下游模組，這將直接挹注廠商的第一季財報；第三，位階嚴重低估：相較於本益比已高的組裝廠與IP股，記憶體族群的股價淨值比（P／BRatio）仍在歷史低檔區，具備極大的向上修復空間。投資人不需要因為短線的波動而懷疑長線的判斷，反之，更應該堅定持有。

news.Title: 外資續砍台積電當神隊友 台股挺住上演V轉/19兆AI軍備戰開打 市場想問「何時回本」/日月光強彈吸金 力積電撐記憶體人氣｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
Alphabet上修AI資本支出、引爆市場對「燒錢換成長」的疑慮，資金轉趨保守，加上比特幣急挫、貴金屬再現劇烈震盪，拖累美股四大指數同步走弱；道瓊下跌1.20%、那斯達克下跌1.59%、標普500指數下跌1.23%、費城半導體指數小跌0.06%，科技股賣壓下亞馬遜、微軟等AI權值股承壓，輝達也回落，而台積電ADR則逆勢上漲1.53%，意外成盤面亮點。
亞股方面漲跌互見，日股上漲0.81%，韓股則下挫1.44%，指數仍守在5千點大關以上；港股下跌1.16%，上證指數小跌0.25%，區域市場氣氛偏保守。
回到台股，加權指數終場小跌18.35點、收31,782.92點，成交金額6,780.75億元，周線止步連六紅翻黑；權王 台積電(2330) 逆勢走揚15元、收1,780元成「神隊友」穩盤，資金轉向具題材與避風港屬性個股，權值股 日月光投控(3711)、 台達電(2308)等 相對抗跌走強，記憶體與面板族群交易也維持熱度，凸顯多空激戰下的輪動格局。
📝盤點熱門股：力積電、群創、友達 今日熱門成交股方面，由記憶體及面板族群帶動交投升溫。 力積電(6770) 受惠台積電帶動與族群買盤回流，成交量達33.8萬張居冠，股價走揚，成為盤面焦點；同屬記憶體的 旺宏(2337)則 在族群震盪下小跌，但市場關注度仍高。
面板雙虎 群創(3481) 與 友達(2409) 因台股震盪吸引短線資金進出，爆量擠進成交前段班，群創收平盤、友達小跌，反映資金以價差操作為主；此外，高配息題材帶動ETF交投活絡， 凱基台灣TOP50(009816) ，股價小跌整理，持續受上市初期話題與主打不配息特色帶動，成交熱度延續。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計賣超192.26億元，資金面略偏保守。外資持續站在調節方，單日賣超71.53億元，在盤勢震盪中維持減碼步調；投信則逆勢加碼，單日買超68.13億元，顯示內資逢低承接力道仍在；相較之下，自營商賣壓最為明顯，單日賣超188.86億元，反映短線操作偏向保守，整體呈現外資與自營商調節、投信撐盤的資金結構。
✨本日議題股：日月光 封測龍頭 日月光投控(3711) ，在盤勢震盪中逆勢強彈，盤中一度大漲約8%，成為撐盤指標。市場關注焦點來自法說會釋出先進封測業務展望，管理層指出今年相關業務有望維持約兩成成長動能，加上CoWoS等先進封裝需求延續，帶動資金回流。外資方面亦持續看好後市，部分機構調升目標價最高至400元，強化市場信心。不過分析師提醒...... 點我看更多
👥馬年薪情大不同： 馬年新春將至，上班族最關心的莫過於年終與紅包支出壓力。根據最新調查顯示，今年勞工平均年終獎金約3.7萬元，但仍有逾兩成自認領不到，顯示企業分配差異持續擴大；另一方面，上班族過年紅包預算平均約1.2萬元，在通膨與生活成本上升的背景下，不少人坦言負擔感加重。除了經濟壓力外，過年聚會的人際互動同樣成為話題，「最怕被問薪水多少」..... .點我看更多
👁️‍🗨️ 憶如犀利講 微軟、Meta、Google 加上今天的亞馬遜（Amazon）2000億美元驚人資本支出，這四檔AI雲端巨頭宣布豪砸6000億美元（折合新台幣將近19兆）在這場AI軍備競賽中，金額令人咋舌，但市場通通不買單，微軟暴跌一成、Alphabet一度跌7.5%後又反彈，Amazon盤後重摔超過一成，只有臉書隔天雖只跌不到2%，但到昨天也已經跌逾一成。
利多不漲？是股價到頭了嗎？到底是股價漲多了，就是要跌？還是AI「畫大餅」何時到個頭已引發泡沫警訊，該抱還是該逃？恐怕是現在投資人最憂心的事。
今年來「法說會變法會」幾乎快變常態，無論是台股或美股！從微軟2月2日公布超強業績，營收年增17%、獲利年增六成，雙雙超越預期，但隔天股價重挫一成；谷歌母公司Alphabet2025年第4季財報，營收與獲利同樣雙雙超預期，備受矚目的「谷歌雲」營收年增高達48%、擔心的Google搜尋第四季同樣有17%成長率，都是消息。
亞馬遜最新公布財報雖然好壞參半，營收優於預期、獲利略低，但還是成長，尤其亞馬遜雲端Amazon Web Services, AWS營收年增24%，寫13季度最佳成績，盤中股價依舊大跌超過10%。「光有好消息已經不夠！」投資人將期待值拉到最高，以至於只要「不到驚豔」股價就是利多出盡，狠心獲利了結下車。
此外，AI支出多是好事！「太多」似乎也是麻煩事？！從各家公布數字來看，微軟、臉書Meta都是1200億美元，Google拉高到1800億美元，已引發「太貴」的疑慮，但想想他為了迎戰OpenAI ，「救命錢」高一些還行，沒想到亞馬遜最新公布竟然已來到2000億美元，已來到「分析師難以理解」境界。
這筆折合新台幣約6.3兆元的開銷支出，到底是什麼概念？等於把台積電總計六年賺的錢（一年賺1兆元）都投資在AI基礎設施的意思，而這是亞馬遜打算一年內花的錢。而Amazon去年獲利才賺77.7億美元，各家雲端大廠在這種AI世紀軍備競賽中都說「雖然很貴，但我不能停。」那投資人不禁要問「何時能回本」？
過去幾乎所有法人機構與專家認定「AI不會泡沫化」的原因，都是因為這些大舉投入AI的廠商均是有獲利的巨型企業，不像當年的.com網路泡沫，而股市不斷攀漲的股價，讓企業在資本市場「挖金礦」、「錢滾錢」效率很好，不夠時辦現增、賣一些或抵押股票來補都很容易。但當資本支出高到超乎相像、銀行開始謹慎融資「收傘」、投資人開始縮手，企業對「AI永動機」也心驚驚時，「本夢比」終歸要回到「本益比」，投資人還是要理性檢視與比較，到底買的是不是能賺錢的AI股。
🔭重大財經事件展望 下周一 (9日)國際財經事件較為平淡，可持續關注美國經濟數據與科技股走勢，以及各國通膨數據與央行利率政策變化，並同時留意區域貨幣波動。
台灣方面，市場聚焦封關前資金調整與企業展望，法說會由 錦明(3230) 登場，除權息則有 光罩(2338) 進行除權，投資人關注個股以及各供應鏈後續動能，整體盤勢預期仍以區間震盪與個股表現為主。
註：加權指數成交金額含盤後定價，不含零股、鉅額、拍賣及標購
（核稿編輯：劉凱銘）

news.Title: 台股多殺多崩逾500點失守月線 台積軟腳 記憶體、PCB齊挫
news.Content:
美股科技股財報不如預期，加上農曆年前丙種結帳及獲利了結賣壓、台股技術線型轉弱，諸多國內外利空因素衝擊，台股今（6）日一開盤台積電（2330）及聯發科（2454）等權值股軟腳，而漲多股更成殺盤重心，群聯（8299）領頭跌停，多檔記憶體股、PCB及ABF等都亮燈跌停股，台股一早重挫逾500點，摜破月線。
權值股、高價股今天成殺盤重心，股王信驊一早一度跌破9,000元大關，最低來到8,850元，千金股中群聯一早跌停後打開，昇達科及勤誠均跌停，台積電及聯發科各跌逾1％及3％，截至9點15分時，台股跌約500點，指數來到31,300點上下，正式摜破月線約31,690點位置。
國內外利空連環爆，比特幣5日跌破7萬美元，加密市場拋售潮持續擴大，市場擔心，若華許掌舵聯準會主席，恐將帶來更具限制性的貨幣環境，另市場也傳出中國大陸大舉拋售黃金與白銀，致出現暴跌。美國科技股賣壓延燒，道瓊、那指與標普指數均跌超1％，致台股今天開盤引發多殺多賣盤。
統一投顧指出，惟美國與伊朗同意於6日在阿曼舉行會談、農曆年後尚有世界行動通訊展（MWC）、輝達開發者大會（Nvidia GTC）等利多題材，中長期多方架構未變。欲規劃抱股過農曆年者建議封關前倒數四個交易日，逢低分批布局績優股，中長線可布局台積電及先進製程/封裝相關、高速傳輸（含光傳輸）、載板與 PCB、電力能源相關、衛星航太軍工、材料升級或短缺概念、成衣製鞋及生技等族群。

news.Title: Skyworks price target lowered to $75 from $85 at Craig-Hallum
news.Content:
Craig-Hallum lowered the firm’s price target on Skyworks ( SWKS ) to $75 from $85 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm highlights Skyworks’ execution as stronger smartphone unit volumes and mix shift geared towards content is driving higher results. The company beat the quarter and guided above the Street as their Broad Markets segment continues to see demand across all end markets. Management noted they expect 2026 blended mobile content to be flat year-over-year as they defended their key mobile sockets, and gained back some architectural changes, but noted mix dynamics could offset overall content, Craig-Hallum adds.

news.Title: 力積電：邏輯代工產線谷底翻身　1月調漲驅動IC價格
news.Content:
（中央社記者張建中新竹2026年2月5日電）晶圓代工廠力積電 (6770) 今天表示，記憶體代工產線供需失衡，連帶排擠邏輯產能，邏輯代工產品線自谷底翻身，產能將供不應求，1月已調漲驅動IC及感測器代工價，預計3月調漲8吋功率元件代工價。
力積電下午召開線上法人說明會，公布2025年第4季營運結果。受惠動態隨機存取記憶體（DRAM）價格上揚，力積電2025年第4季營收124.95億元，季增6%，毛利率6%，稅後淨損6.54億元，每股虧損0.16元。
力積電副總經理譚仲民指出，2025年第4季營運朝向正向改善，出貨量41.5萬片約當12吋晶圓，產能利用率82%。
力積電2025年總營收1501.98億元，增加8%，毛損率3%，稅後淨損78.13億元，每股虧損1.86元。
朱憲國說，記憶體代工產品線出現供需結構性失衡情況，客戶投片積極，預期缺口可能延續到下半年。高階AI伺服器排擠消費應用的中低端產品，帶動DDR3及DDR4需求提升。
至於快閃記憶體方面，SLC儲存型快閃記憶體（NAND Flash）價格上漲，編碼型快閃記憶體（NORFlash）客戶驗證已告一段落，去年底逐步放量，預期今年可望進一步提升。
邏輯代工業務方面，朱憲國表示，1月起伺服器需求強勁，因部分與記憶體共用機台，將排擠邏輯產能，加上銅鑼廠出售美光（Micron）消息，刺激需求回升，1月調升驅動IC及感測器報價。
朱憲國說，AI伺服器功率元件需求增加，2月起無法滿足客戶需求，因部分竹南8吋廠無塵室將改為12吋設備，可能使得產能吃緊，預計3月調升價格，邏輯代工產品線自谷底翻身。
至於與印度塔塔電子建廠合作案，朱憲國表示，雙方合作不受出售銅鑼廠予美光影響，累計已有1.43億美元收入入帳，未來將共同開發邏輯代工市場。
力積電2025年實際資本支出2.86億美元，因設備取得時程影響，低於原先規劃的4.8億美元，2026年資本支出初步規劃3億美元。

news.Title: 搶AI門票　力積電與美光策略合作獲HBM後段代工訂單
news.Content:
（中央社記者張建中新竹2026年02月5日電）晶圓代工廠力積電 (6770) 與美國記憶體廠美光（Micron）策略合作，力積電表示，除銅鑼廠處分予美光，可望有18億美元入帳，同時可望獲得美光HBM後段代工訂單，並將精進DRAM製程技術。
力積電下午召開線上法人說明會，法人關注與美光的合作案。力積電總經理朱憲國指出，銅鑼廠將分階段轉讓予美光，加速美光在台灣布局，現有的設備和人員將轉回力積電新竹廠區，力積電則將有18億美元入帳，主要用於降低負債。
朱憲國說，力積電納入美光先進封裝供應鏈，雙方建立長期夥伴關係，而美光同意預付設備款，力積電未來將設置專線，提供美光高頻寬記憶體（HBM）後段代工。
朱憲國表示，為美光代工業務最快明年才可望貢獻業績，不過，內部訂定目標3年內3D人工智慧（AI）業務可望貢獻20%營收。
朱憲國表示，力積電目前以4Gb DDR3產品技術為主，將透過與美光合作精進技術，包括容量及速度都將提升，至於細節則不便多談。

news.Title: NAND 控制晶片大廠公佈一月營收   年成長190% 刷新歷史單月新高
news.Content:
財經中心/綜合報導
NAND 控制晶片暨NAND儲存解決方案整合服務領導廠商 群聯電子 (Phison; 8299TT) 於今日 (2026/02/06) 公佈了2026年1月份營運結果，合併營收為新台幣104.52億元，月成長20%，年成長達190% (YoY)，刷新歷 史單月新高。
群聯電子執行長潘健成表示：「2026 年首月群聯即展現強勁的成長動能，反映出全球高階儲存需求的剛性支 撐。1 月份控制晶片總出貨量寫下年增 (YoY) 160% 的強勁成長，其中具備高毛利與高技術門檻的工規控制 晶片出貨量亦同步年增近 70% (YoY)，雙雙創下單月歷史新高。此外，在位元出貨量 (Bit Growth) 方面也達 成 51% 的年成長率，顯示群聯在中高階客製化儲存市場的佈局上皆獲顯著成效。」 潘健成進一步說明：「當前 NAND Flash 產業供給端依舊持續呈現極度緊繃 (Tight Supply)，主因在於 NAND 原廠對於資本支出與擴產規劃依舊維持保守審慎的基調，也使得供需失衡的狀況短期內難以快速改善。
在此 NAND 供給緊張的產業環境下，群聯將資源優先集中於企業級 SSD 與高附加價值的客製化儲存應用市場，積極 支援資料中心與 AI 應用所帶動的強勁需求，以強化獲利結構；同時，針對 PC OEM、IoT 與手機等中高階客 製化專案，群聯亦持續全力協助全球客戶，以期在有限的資源條件下，最大化滿足客戶需求。」
潘健成最後補充：「 近期市場對於中國半導體原廠提前量產有所議論，他強調，中國半導體廠目前的產能提前 釋放，撇開初期良率較低的實際情況，光是要填補其中國龐大的國內內需缺口都還遠遠不足。根據市調機構資 料顯示，全球 NAND 供給缺口仍接近 20%，再加上 AI 推論所產生的資料儲存需求幾乎沒有上限，這意味著任 何單一半導體原廠的擴產行動，短期內都將無法扭轉全球性NAND缺貨與漲價的格局。而群聯將持續發揮技術 領先與供應鏈調節優勢，積極擴張AI相關產品線與應用生態系，在震盪的市況中維持領先地位。」
《民視新聞網》提醒您：內容僅供參考，投資人於決策時應審慎評估風險，並就投資結果自行負責。
原文出處： NAND 控制晶片大廠公佈一月營收 年成長190% 刷新歷史單月新高

news.Title: 《科技》Arm門檻放寬 台廠智原、芯鼎可望加速專案落地
news.Content:
【時報記者王逸芯台北報導】Arm宣布升級旗下Arm Flexible Access方案，透過擴大可存取的產品組合、簡化加入流程與調整新創適用門檻，進一步降低晶片設計初期的技術與財務複雜度。Arm表示，此次方案升級已吸引包括智原(3035)、芯鼎(6695)等在內的多家合作夥伴持續深化應用，不僅有助於加快專案開發節奏，也能協助新創企業與成熟晶片設計團隊在邊緣AI等新興應用領域中更有效控管風險、放大創新彈性。
Arm商業營運總監NeilParris指出，晶片設計的創新來自於持續的反覆運算與嘗試，無論是新創公司或成熟設計團隊，若能在早期階段降低財務與技術門檻，將更有利於專注於技術探索、測試與最佳化。他表示，Arm Flexible Access持續演進的初衷，在於讓創新者能以更有效率的方式，從概念驗證一路推進至實際晶片量產。
在技術面向上，Arm近年持續將邊緣AI能力納入Flexible Access方案。繼2025年10月導入Armv9邊緣AI運算平台後，本次更新進一步新增多項關鍵產品。其中，Ethos-U85 NPU相較前一代效能提升約四倍，並支援基於Transformer架構的模型，適用於即時、常時連線的邊緣AI應用場景。
Arm也同步擴大2026年Flexible Access新創版方案的適用範圍，將融資門檻提高至5,000萬美元、年度營收門檻提高至500萬美元，使更多具成長潛力的新創企業得以免費加入方案，並依自身節奏推進產品規模化與差異化發展。Arm亦全面簡化一般企業加入Flexible Access的流程。Arm指出，除符合新創資格的企業外，其餘合作夥伴僅需支付8.5萬美元的統一年費，即可存取完整Arm IP與相關工具資源，並享有不限次數的設計定案(Tape-out)權益。該模式可支援團隊從早期概念探索、原型驗證一路推進至量產階段，並將授權費用延後至設計定案完成後再行支付，以降低前期資金壓力。
Arm進一步指出，Flexible Access方案成員可即時下載多樣化的Arm IP與配套工具，並透過Arm IP Explorer比較不同方案、進行自主管理與培訓；在研發期間，團隊亦可反覆模擬與調整IP配置，提升設計彈性。部分成員同時也與Arm認證設計合作夥伴計畫(Arm Approved Design Partners)合作，透過全球設計、驗證與ASIC服務專家的網路，加速開發流程並提升商業化效率。
目前，Arm Flexible Access方案已在全球促成超過400款晶片設計。在台灣市場，已有超過50家企業加入，包括智原、芯鼎與通寶半導體等。
Arm表示，智原自2021年加入Flexible Access方案後，已將相關資源應用於微控制器(MCU)、網通、工業用與消費型SoC的開發，並進一步延伸至Edge AI與Endpoint AI設計平台；芯鼎則藉此加速其在車用、機器視覺與消費性影像市場的研發進程；通寶半導體亦透過該方案開發高整合度SoC，應用於高階多功能事務機及列印設備，提升影像輸出穩定度與品質。
Arm指出，隨著邊緣AI與專用晶片需求持續升溫，Arm Flexible Access將持續扮演連結創新團隊與Arm生態系的重要平台，協助更多晶片設計者加速從原型開發邁向量產與商業化部署。

news.Title: 美光重挫！華邦電力積電等記憶體全走弱 分析師：不急著搶短
news.Content: 美光股價重挫，拖累記憶體族群全面走弱，今（5）日盤中包括華邦電（2344）、南亞科（2408）以及華東（8110）重跌逾半根停板；群聯（8299）、力積電（6770）等10餘檔全面下挫。分析師表示，記憶體族群基本面雖仍強勁，但先前漲幅已大，市場進入利多提前反應的挑剔階段，現階段不宜急著搶短。

news.Title: 面板記憶體齊亮 群創旺宏人氣旺/不是科技也能市值破兆 沃爾瑪示範給台股看/星鏈想像空間大開 太空概念股繼續飛｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
美國市場一邊憂心AI工具競爭加劇壓縮軟體與資訊服務商獲利空間，一邊觀望科技巨擘產業前景，拖累美股四大指數震盪收低。道瓊工業指數下跌0.34%、那斯達克指數回落1.43%、標普500指數下挫0.84%，費城半導體指數跌幅達2.07%，科技與半導體族群成為主要壓力來源。盤面上，輝達、微軟、Meta等大型科技股同步回檔，Google與Amazon在財報前也出現修正；半導體類股方面，英特爾在談及AI與GPU布局後小幅走揚，但輝達與超微同步承壓。台積電ADR隨費半走弱而回檔1.64%，成為拖累美股科技盤勢的關鍵之一。
亞股方面，日股從高點回落，下跌0.78%；韓股延續強勢，上漲1.57％續創新高；港股與陸股則小幅走揚，區域股市走勢分歧。
回到台股，加權指數終場上漲94.45點，收在32,289.81點，漲幅0.29%，成交金額6,863.3億元，量能雖縮減但仍維持在相對高檔。權王 台積電(2330) 受ADR回落影響，股價下挫15元；盤面焦點轉向題材與族群輪動，低軌衛星概念股持續吸引資金，面板雙雄攜手走揚，表現亮眼；記憶體族群受南亞科營收利多帶動，受到市場青睞。整體而言，在美股震盪、亞股分歧的背景下，台股展現相對韌性，資金聚焦具題材與基本面支撐的族群輪動。
📝盤點熱門股：群創、旺宏、元晶 今日熱門成交股方面，盤面資金明顯集中在記憶體與太空題材。 群創(3481) 在SpaceX星鏈供應鏈題材點火下走揚亮燈，市場解讀為太空通訊與面板應用想像延伸，成交動能明顯放大；記憶體族群的 旺宏(2337) 、 力積電(6770) 受到南亞科1月營收暴增、產業景氣轉佳帶動，資金卡位記憶體復甦題材，推升股價走強。 元晶(6443) 同步受惠星鏈與太陽能題材連動，成為資金輪動焦點。
ETF方面，剛上市的 凱基台灣TOP50(009816) 隨大盤氣氛轉穩，吸引短線資金進出，推升成交表現，整體前五檔均呈現收紅，成交熱絡。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計買超157.78億元，資金面續偏多。外資持續站在買方，單日買超120.66億元，延續回補態勢，成為撐盤主力；投信同步加碼，買超53.82億元，顯示內資對盤勢仍具信心；相較之下，自營商操作持續調節，單日賣超16.70億元，但未影響整體資金偏多結構。
✨本日議題股：星鏈題材概念股 在低軌衛星、綠能與電子材料多題材交織下，資金明顯回流非AI族群。太陽能族群中， 聯合再生(3576) 領軍走強，搭配多檔概念股同步亮燈漲停，盤中仍有約3萬張買單排隊等買，市場解讀為政策想像與題材性買盤推升，分析師認為農曆年前資金偏多，有利短線續強；電子材料與載板相關個股亦表態， 燿華(2367) 在低軌衛星與太空通訊應用題材加持下，亮燈攻上26年新高價，盤中買單高掛約2.8萬張，人氣明顯升溫，分析師指出...... 點我看更多
👁️‍🗨️ 憶如犀利講 全球財經界聚焦沃爾瑪（Walmart）成為史上首家市值突破1兆美元的零售商！當大家還在擔心川普關稅衝擊美國消費市場，但全球擁有上萬家門市的Walmart，不僅股價不跌，甚至還能獲投資人追捧，市值突破上兆美元，與科技巨頭並駕齊驅，為傳產股票揚眉吐氣。
若反觀台股前20大市值公司，只剩南亞一家傳產股，以市值約台幣6千多億元排在第19位，金融股也只有富邦金、國泰金與中信金三檔入榜，其他16家公司全數都是科技公司。日前外媒痛批台灣得了「荷蘭病」，產業過度傾斜科技，傳產業中也不乏一些優質企業，為何就不能像Walmart一樣獲得投資人青睞？
證交所旗下指數公司日前精選一份「璞玉指數成份股」，從上市公司中，找出獲利穩定、長期配息，但卻沒有被市場過度追捧的好股票，就像從石頭裡挑出還沒被打磨的「璞玉」，並點名有達到這些要求的個股分別是統一超、遠傳、和碩等。消息一出，卻被網友狠酸「這些根本買到撞到」、「璞玉就是現在買太早」、「選傳產就可以先下去了」，更用賭博行業的諺語「一刀窮一刀富」暗指石頭的價值，可能一刀下去一夜暴富也可能傾家盪產。
事實上，若深究Walmart為何市值可破兆美元，除了他「先行者優勢」，不僅美國最大，更是全世界第一，無論零售電商的營收，遠遠超越第二名的亞瑪遜七成以上外外，它的轉型更是速度飛快，當全球投資目光轉向「AI應用」時，這家連鎖巨擘，已經與OpenAI和Google建立合作夥伴關係，將其線上購物工具直接嵌入其搜尋聊天機器人，已成功翻身為「科技驅動的零售平台」。
台灣的傳產業並非沒有機會轉型，曾經富可敵國的台塑集團也曾投資台積電，如今的南亞科、福懋科、台勝科、南電等等，從半導體、電子材料、PCB、記憶體到電子化學品都有布局，但除了台積電沒有久抱，其他產業的轉型也未見成效。
傳產股要獲投資人目光，除了「本身是璞玉」之外，領導者在規模與獲利高峰之際，甚至已預見競爭林立、業績下滑時，能否有焯焯目光遠見，以絕決的決心帶領公司轉型，台灣傳產過去多以轉投資、多角化投資做試金石，但轉型能成功者幾稀。
或許成功轉骨有時候可能還需要一點運氣，但願意用巨資跨入另一個未知領域，不是那麼多的傳產大老敢或肯嚐試。上兆美元的Walmart或許可以給這些「璞玉」們帶來一點激勵作用，如何運用AI或是新科技，重新為公司帶來新的成長曲線，能展現可預見的高獲利，也才有機會真正吸引投資人的目光。

news.Title: Skyworks Solutions Q1 Earnings Call Highlights
news.Content:
Q1 beat expectations: Skyworks reported revenue of roughly $1.035–1.04 billion and non‑GAAP EPS of $1.54 (about $0.14 above the midpoint), with a 46.6% gross margin, $339 million in free cash flow, ~$1.6 billion in cash and $1 billion in debt.

Mobile concentration and near‑term guidance: The largest customer drove ~67% of revenue and mobile was 62% of sales; management expects a ~20% sequential decline in mobile for Q2, guiding revenue to $875–925 million and midpoint EPS of $1.04 while broad markets remain steady.

Qorvo merger on track: Skyworks reiterated the planned combination with Qorvo as transformative, targeting more than $500 million of synergies and combined gross margins of 50–55% through cycles, with closing expected in early 2027 pending approvals.

Interested in Skyworks Solutions, Inc.? Here are five stocks we like better.

MarketBeat Week in Review – 06/23 - 6/27

Skyworks Solutions (NASDAQ:SWKS) reported fiscal first-quarter 2026 results that exceeded the high end of its guidance range, citing upside in both mobile and broad markets. Management also reiterated its expectations and timeline for the company’s previously announced combination with Qorvo, while emphasizing that the call’s focus would remain on quarterly performance and near-term outlook.

For the fiscal first quarter, Skyworks posted revenue of $1.035 billion to $1.04 billion, which management said exceeded the high end of the company’s guidance range. Non-GAAP diluted earnings per share were $1.54, which CFO Philip Carter said was $0.14 above the midpoint of guidance.

→ The New Defense Prime: Ondas Buys the Kill Chain

Skyworks Stock Down 16% in 2025, Poised for AI Edge Surge

Gross profit was $482 million with gross margin of 46.6%. Operating expenses were $230 million, at the low end of guidance, resulting in operating income of $252 million and an operating margin of 24.3%. Other income was $6 million and the effective tax rate was 10%, producing net income of $232 million.

Skyworks generated $396 million in operating cash flow and spent $57 million on capital expenditures, resulting in free cash flow of $339 million, or a 33% free cash flow margin. The company paid $106 million in quarterly dividends and ended the quarter with approximately $1.6 billion in cash and investments and $1 billion in debt.

→ Insiders Rang in the New Year Selling These Stocks, Buyers Beware

Cirrus Logic Stock Surges on Strong Apple iPhone Upgrade Cycle

Management said the company’s largest customer accounted for approximately 67% of revenue during the quarter, consistent with the prior quarter. Mobile represented 62% of total revenue, coming in above expectations due to what Skyworks described as healthy sell-through at its top customer and strong execution on new product launches.

CEO Phil Brace said smartphone replacement cycles, while still lengthy, are “beginning to shorten,” which he tied to consumers upgrading more frequently as “AI-capable devices” and more integrated features reach the market. He added that the company had not seen demand impacts from broader industry discussions around component pricing and availability, and noted that channel inventory remains lean.

→ Mag 7 Outlook: What Apple, Microsoft, Meta, and Tesla Just Told Us

Looking ahead, Brace said Skyworks “successfully defended key mobile sockets” and gained content where architecture changes created opportunities, but also cautioned that product mix dynamics could moderate some of that progress. Based on current visibility, management expects blended mobile content to be “roughly flat year-over-year,” while reiterating that it would not comment on specific sockets, models, or launch timing.

Broad markets delivered what management called its eighth consecutive quarter of growth, with revenue up double digits year-over-year. Carter said broad markets grew 4% sequentially and 11% year-over-year, driven by edge IoT, data center and cloud infrastructure, and automotive. Brace added that broad markets continues to deliver margins above the corporate average and benefits from “long cycle and multi-year” demand drivers.

In prepared remarks and during Q&A, management highlighted several areas of strength:

Edge IoT and Wi‑Fi 7: Brace said Wi‑Fi 7 momentum continues to build due to higher throughput, lower latency, and reliability, and positioned it as an enabler as AI inference moves closer to the edge. He cited strong design win activity, a healthy backlog, and early engagement on Wi‑Fi 8 programs.

Automotive: Management characterized demand as solid, driven by increased connectivity across telematics, infotainment, and software-defined vehicle architectures. Brace said the pipeline is broad and global, aligned with long-cycle platforms across multiple OEMs and tiers.

Data center and networking: Brace said demand signals are improving, with increasing design win activity as the ecosystem transitions to next-generation 800G and emerging 1.6T architectures. He highlighted expansion in timing and power management content, including “jitter attenuating clocks” and power isolation products, and later said data center is growing faster than overall broad markets and delivering better-than-corporate-average margins.

Brace also noted longer-term interest in satellite communications, while saying it was not yet large enough to discuss in detail.

For the fiscal second quarter of 2026, Skyworks guided revenue to a range of $875 million to $925 million. Carter said mobile is expected to decline approximately 20% sequentially, consistent with seasonality, while broad markets is expected to be flat sequentially. Broad markets is projected to represent 44% of sales in Q2 and be up high single digits year-over-year.

Gross margin is projected at approximately 44.5% to 45.5%, reflecting seasonally lower volume. Operating expenses are expected to be between $230 million and $240 million as the company continues funding key R&D initiatives while controlling discretionary spending. Below the line, Skyworks anticipates about $4 million in other income, a 10% effective tax rate, and a diluted share count of 151 million. At the midpoint of revenue guidance ($900 million), management said this equates to expected diluted EPS of $1.04.

In response to questions on gross margin drivers, Carter said the quarter-to-quarter decline is “mostly due to typical seasonality in mobile and lower volume” and also cited a slightly higher mix of Android. He added that after three consecutive quarters of exceeding the high end of guidance, the company has incurred higher input costs such as expedite fees to meet on-time delivery targets.

Brace opened the call by reiterating Skyworks’ view that its announced combination with Qorvo is “highly strategic and transformative,” citing expected benefits including greater scale, deeper R&D, a broader technology portfolio, reduced historical mobile volatility, and an expanded total addressable market into defense and aerospace. He pointed to an expected path to more than $500 million of synergies over time and said the combined company is expected to achieve gross margins through cycles in the 50% to 55% range, supported by operating leverage and enhanced earnings power.

Management said it has completed initial regulatory filings, scheduled a shareholder vote, and begun integration planning, while expecting a comprehensive regulatory review. Skyworks reiterated its expectation that the transaction will close in early calendar year 2027, subject to regulatory approvals, approval by both companies’ shareholders, and other customary closing conditions.

During Q&A, Brace described the portfolios as complementary—highlighting Qorvo’s antenna-side capabilities—and said the combined company would have broader RF scale across the chain. Separately, Carter said Skyworks has “ample opportunity and cash” for capital deployment, but noted that during the pendency period there are requirements around buybacks and the company also expects to access debt markets in the next 12 months in anticipation of closing the transaction.

Skyworks Solutions, Inc is a leading semiconductor company that designs and manufactures analog and mixed-signal semiconductors for use in radio frequency (RF) and mobile communications markets. The company's portfolio includes power amplifiers, front-end modules, switches, filters, low-noise amplifiers, and other components that enable wireless connectivity in smartphones, tablets, wearables, automotive telematics, and broadband infrastructure. With a focus on energy efficiency and integration, Skyworks serves a broad range of customers in the mobile, Internet of Things (IoT), automotive, connected home, and industrial end markets.

Headquartered in Irvine, California, Skyworks operates a network of design, development, and manufacturing facilities across North America, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific region.

The article " Skyworks Solutions Q1 Earnings Call Highlights " was originally published by MarketBeat.

news.Title: 《半導體》世界 Q1產能利用率上看85％
news.Content:
【時報-台北電】世界先進法說會釋展望，總經理方濟時表示，電源管理、伺服器相關客戶應用需求回溫，公司預期今年第一季產能利用率可回升至80％至85％，成熟製程需求維持穩健，全年資本支出亦將維持去年約600至700億元高檔水準，對中長期營運動能仍持審慎樂觀看法。
回顧去年第四季表現，世界先進單季合併營收為125.94 億元，季增2％，主要受惠產品平均銷售單價上揚以及匯率有利因素，第四季毛利率27.5％，單季稅後純益為17.48億元，每股稅後純益0.93元，較去年同期略為下滑。
若以全年來看，世界先進2025年合併營收485.91億元，年增10.3％，主要來自8吋晶圓出貨量年增約15％，即便部分受到新台幣升值及平均售價下滑影響，整體營收仍維持雙位數成長。全年毛利率約28％，年增約1個百分點，反映產能利用率自63％回升至74％及產品組合改善，全年稅後純益79.08億元，年增12.2％，每股稅後純益4.22元，仍較前一年小幅成長。
展望今年首季，世界先進預估，8吋晶圓出貨量季增1％至3％，但產品平均銷售單價季減3％至5％，毛利率則預期介於28％至30％。隨年底庫存調整逐步結束，目前公司訂單能見度約3個月，短期需求動能趨於穩定。
產能規劃上，世界先進指出，今年持續進行部分既有產能汰換與升級，全年8吋晶圓產能約330萬片，年減約4％。第一季因部分廠區短期歲修及產品組合調整，平均月產出將降至約26.6萬片。另外，新加坡12吋晶圓廠2026年將進行產品驗證，預計2026年底量產、2027年第一季貢獻營收，作為公司長期成熟製程布局的重要支點。
世界去年資本支出約640億元，略低於預期，主因部分設備採購付款條件優於預期。展望今年，資本支出約600至700億元水準，其中約85％用於新加坡12吋廠建置與設備投資，其餘則投入8吋廠製程優化。折舊費用方面，2026年全年折舊金額估96.2億元，年增約12％，顯示前期投資將逐步反映於成本結構。(新聞來源 : 工商時報一張瑞益／台北報導)

news.Title: Qorvo (QRVO) Posts Bullish Q3 FY 2026 Results, Tempered Guidance for Q4
news.Content:
Qorvo Inc. (NASDAQ: QRVO ) is one of the most undervalued stocks to buy and hold for 5 years . On January 27, Qorvo Inc. (NASDAQ:QRVO) reported healthy Q3 FY 2026 results, with revenue of $993.0 million, up 8.4% year over year but down 6.2% sequentially and modestly ahead of consensus. Adjusted EPS of $2.17 also came in ahead of the Street’s $1.86 estimate.

The company issued its revenue guidance for the fiscal fourth quarter, which fell short of analysts’ current expectations. The company expects to report between $775.00 million and $825.00 million in revenue, below analysts’ $903.8 million forecast, and per-share profit of $1.05 to $1.35, just shy of the $1.37 Wall Street is projecting.

Qorvo Inc. (NASDAQ:QRVO) supplies radio-frequency chips to Apple, its largest customer, which accounts for about half of the company’s total revenue. Lower revenue expectations hint at a “seasonal” decline in demand from the iPhone maker, according to Qorvo CEO Bob Bruggeworth. The company is in the midst of a $22 billion cash-and-stock transaction to merge with its larger rival, Skyworks Solutions Inc., a deal announced in October 2025.

Qorvo Inc. (NASDAQ:QRVO) develops and sells technologies and products for wireless, wired, and power markets in the U.S., Asia, and Europe. The company’s services cater to fields such as defense and aerospace, 5G and 6G infrastructure, and connectivity and sensor technology, among others.

While we acknowledge the potential of QRVO as an investment, we believe certain AI stocks offer greater upside potential and carry less downside risk. If you’re looking for an extremely undervalued AI stock that also stands to benefit significantly from Trump-era tariffs and the onshoring trend, see our free report on the best short-term AI stock .

news.Title: 投信百億銀彈開路 台積點火台股暴衝571點/記憶體股爆量洗牌 探針族群接力衝鋒/GDP保4是利多？股市還要看聯準會臉色｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
美國市場甩開貴金屬、比特幣崩跌陰霾，在AI晶片概念股回溫下，加上科技巨擘在財報前走揚，美股穩住陣腳。道瓊工業指數上漲1.05%、那斯達克指數上揚0.56%、標普500指數走高0.54%，費城半導體指數反彈1.70%，半導體族群擺脫前一波急跌壓力。個股表現上，Alphabet、Amazon財報前夕買盤卡位，股價走揚；蘋果受OLED版MacBook Pro與M系列晶片題材激勵大漲；記憶體族群明顯回神，美光、Sandisk強勢反彈，帶動費半回溫。不過，輝達因市場傳出對OpenAI投資進度雜音，股價相對承壓；台積電ADR則隨半導體指數反彈同步走高3.27%，成為支撐美股科技盤勢重要一環。
亞股全面反攻，日股飆漲破2千點，勁揚3.92%，韓股同樣激昂，飆漲6.84%；港股與陸股同步收漲，區域股市擺脫前一日修正陰霾明顯回升。
回到台股，加權指數終場大漲571.33點，收在32,195.36點，漲幅1.81%，成功站回月線之上，成交金額7,962.51億元，資金回流態勢明確。權王 台積電(2330) 在ADR走強與先進製程題材支撐下穩盤，成為指數反彈核心；電子族群全面回溫，低軌衛星、探針卡等題材股輪番點火，成交熱度居高不下。整體來看，在美股科技股回穩、亞股齊揚與內資積極加碼支撐下，台股呈現量價齊揚、題材股接力輪動的強勢反彈格局。
📝盤點熱門股：華邦電、旺宏、凱基台灣TOP50 今日熱門成交股方面，成交動能明顯集中在記憶體與面板族群，以及新掛牌ETF題材。記憶體族群 華邦電(2344) 、 旺宏(2337) 、 力積電(6770) 同步名列前五大成交股，股價表現偏弱，市場解讀，先前記憶體族群急漲後，短線籌碼鬆動，加上盤中傳出部分資金獲利了結與避險調節，導致買賣交投明顯放大，加上族群基本面並未出現新的利多支撐，使走勢轉為震盪整理。
面板股 群創(3481) 同樣延續走弱格局，受面板報價與產業前景雜音影響，市場多空交戰加劇，成交熱絡主要來自短線資金換手。相較之下，新掛牌ETF 凱基台灣TOP50(009816) 股價走揚，市場關注焦點在於台積電帶動大盤強彈後的被動式資金布局與新產品話題，吸引買盤進場，使成交量能維持高檔，成為前五名中唯一收紅的標的。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計買超110.10億元，資金面呈現偏多結構。外資續站買方，單日買超72.68億元，顯示在盤勢震盪下仍維持回補動作；投信買盤力道最為明確，買超106.34億元，成為推升盤勢的主要支撐；相較之下，自營商則偏向調節，單日賣超68.92億元，反映短線操作態度仍較保守。
✨本日議題股：探針概念股 受日本青森大暴雪衝擊當地供應鏈影響，台廠迎來轉單題材，帶動探針卡、碳化矽族群同步點火，多檔個股強勢噴發；其中測試介面廠今年展望轉趨樂觀， 穎崴(6515) 、 精測(6510) 、 旺矽(6223) 今同步改寫新高紀錄，成為盤面資金追逐焦點。法人指出...... 點我看更多
👥財經大人物： 去年市場一度傳出「街口要倒了」的耳語，甚至在巷弄間流竄，街口支付董事長梅驊親自聽聞後化身「第一線情報員」急踩煞車、對外說明穩軍心。他直言，台灣行動支付最大的挑戰不在技術，而在「不肯分享」的生態競爭結構，業者各守山頭，讓非現金社會推進卡關。面對LINE Pay等強敵環伺，梅驊強調街口選擇...... 點我看更多
👁️‍🗨️ 憶如犀利講 2026年GDP不只保4！國發會今（3）日舉行年終記者會，主委葉俊顯公布2026年台灣經濟成長率目標上看4.56%。數字一出，不少專家直言「還是太保守」，畢竟2025年GDP最終衝破8.6%，改寫15年新高。
國發會指出，2026年GDP成長率的基準預測為4.11%，目標值4.56%，不僅高於主計總處的3.54%、央行的3.67%，也優於台經院、台綜院預估，僅略低於中經院的4.14%。
對此，統一投顧董事長黎方國直言，這個數字仍有上修空間。他指出，2025年初各界普遍只估成長3%，國發會第二季甚至認為下半年僅剩1%，結果卻一路上修，最終GDP飆破8.6%。如果去年那麼強，今年只剩4%，落差實在太大。
黎方國提出兩大理由支撐樂觀展望。其一，美國去年第四季經濟成長率高達5%，遠超市場預期。川普推動關稅戰，目的就是促使製造業回流美國，美政府估算未來幾年投資金額高達18兆美元，遠高於過去每年約1兆美元的水準，加上年底美國期中選舉，政策力道只會更猛。2026製造業回美，台灣供應鏈勢必受惠。理由二，IMF元月最新報告幾乎全面上修多國GDP預估，包括美中日，黎方國認為，未來全球經濟成長率還有再上調的空間。
不過，GDP上修，股市就一定會漲嗎？黎方國提醒投資人「別高興得太早」。他強調，基本面向好，並不必然等於股市上漲，真正左右行情的關鍵，往往是貨幣政策帶動的資金熱錢。
他舉例，自21世紀以來，全球僅在2009年與2020年出現經濟負成長，但台股2020年卻暴漲78%，關鍵就在聯準會大規模QE、資金氾濫。反觀2022年，台積電、聯發科獲利創歷史新高，股價卻因升息循環而重挫。
因此，GDP目標再漂亮，也可能被緊縮的貨幣政策抵銷。近期市場對聯準會新主席候選人華許「鴿皮鷹骨」的疑慮升溫，全球金融市場震盪，其實正反映同樣的邏輯。
2026年台灣經濟「保4」究竟是利多，還是已被市場消化？股市投資人怎麼看，明天台股的反應，或許就能見真章。

news.Title: 看好成熟製程需求回溫！世界先進2026年Q1產能利用率拚8成以上
news.Content:
晶圓代工廠世界先進（5347）於3日法說會中釋出最新營運展望，總經理方濟時表示，隨著客戶於年底庫存調整告一段落，加上電源管理、伺服器相關應用需求持續回溫，公司預期2026年第一季產能利用率可回升至80%至85%，成熟製程需求維持穩健，全年資本支出亦將維持去年約600至700億元左右高檔水準，顯示公司對中長期營運動能仍持審慎樂觀看法。
回顧2025年第四季表現，世界先進單季合併營收為新台幣125.94億元，季增約2%，主要受惠產品平均銷售單價上揚及匯率有利因素，部分抵銷8吋晶圓出貨量季減約7%的影響。第四季毛利率達 27.5%，較前一季小幅提升0.7個百分點，不過仍受到產能利用率下滑、地震造成一次性損失及生產成本偏高等因素牽制。單季歸屬母公司稅後淨利為17.48億元，每股稅後盈餘0.93元，較去年同期略為下滑。
若以全年來看，世界先進2025年合併營收達485.91億元，年增10.3%，主要來自8吋晶圓出貨量年增約15%，即便部分受到新台幣升值及平均售價下滑影響，整體營收仍維持雙位數成長。全年毛利率約28%，較2024年提升約1個百分點，反映產能利用率自63%回升至74%及產品組合改善。
展望2026年第一季，世界先進表示，在假設新台幣兌美元匯率約31.3元下，預估8吋晶圓出貨量將季增約1%至3%，但產品平均銷售單價可能季減3%至5%，毛利率則預期介於28%至30%之間。隨著年底庫存調整逐步結束，目前公司訂單能見度約為三個月，顯示短期需求動能趨於穩定。

news.Title: 外資大刀壓境 權值股走弱台股重挫下殺/記憶體族群團滅 低軌衛星升空發光/金馬年該抱還是跑？歷史數據給答案｜Yahoo財經掃描
news.Content:
美國市場受川普提名聯準會前理事華許出任Fed主席所引發的「華許效應」影響，投資人憂心未來貨幣政策轉向更為鷹派、縮表速度加快，加上關稅政策進度仍具不確定性，風險性資產承壓，黃金、白銀期貨下殺，四大指數同步走弱。道瓊工業指數下跌0.36%，那斯達克指數跌0.94%，標普500指數回檔0.43%，費城半導體指數則重挫3.87%，終止連續創高走勢，半導體族群成為賣壓重心。科技個股方面，市場對資本支出與估值修正的疑慮升溫，AI與晶片族群同步降溫，台積電ADR亦隨費半走弱重挫2.65%，未能撐住科技股氣氛。
除股市外，貴金屬與加密貨幣同步重挫。華許任命消息引發獲利了結與槓桿斷頭賣壓，白銀期貨單日崩跌31.4%，創逾40年最大跌幅，黃金期貨亦重挫11.4%；市場指出，白銀短線槓桿資金集中，在融資追繳壓力下加速下殺。幣市同樣承壓，比特幣一夕大跌7.5%，失守8萬美元關卡，資金對縮表與貨幣紀律轉向的疑慮升溫。
亞股方面同步承壓，日股、韓股重挫，走勢回檔明顯；港股下跌，上證指數同樣走弱，市場觀望氣氛濃厚，整體亞股呈現偏空整理格局。
台股方面，受到國際股市轉弱與外資大幅調節影響，加權指數今收盤下跌439.72點，收在31624.03點，跌幅1.37%，成交金額7416.78億元，市場風險意識明顯升高。權王 台積電(2330) 收盤下跌10元，成為拖累指數的關鍵因素；盤面權值股普遍承壓，電子族群走勢疲弱。相對之下，題材股成為資金短線停泊方向，低軌衛星概念股逆勢吸引買盤，BBU族群表現也相對抗跌，成為盤面少數亮點。整體來看，在外資賣壓未歇、國際變數升高下，台股呈現指數回檔、量能降溫、題材股零星撐場的整理格局。
📝盤點熱門股：群創、力積電、旺宏 今日熱門成交股方面，成交量前五名跌多漲少的盤勢主導，資金明顯集中在記憶體族群與話題股調節。成交量居冠的 群創(3481) 收21.15元，單日爆出逾41萬張大量，延續「兆元宴」題材利多出盡後的調整走勢，買賣雙方在低檔換手頻繁。 力積電(6770) 與第三名 旺宏(2337) 同屬記憶體族群，在產業雜音與先前漲多背景下，獲利與解套賣壓同步湧現。
相較之下，後段兩檔逆勢吸引資金進駐。低軌衛星股 元晶(6443) 收40元股價走揚，在太空題材撐盤下，使其成為少數紅盤焦點； 宏碁(2353) 同步走強，受惠兆元宴話題加持，短線買氣相對集中。整體來看，熱門成交股反映資金在利多消化後快速輪動。
📌三大法人買賣超 三大法人今日合計賣超535.36億元，資金面延續明顯調節態勢。外資賣壓最為沉重，單日大砍481.18億元，成為壓抑盤勢的主要力量；內資方面，自營商同步偏空操作，賣超104.98億元，操作明顯轉趨保守；相較之下，投信逆勢小幅加碼，買超50.8億元，成為三大法人中唯一站在買方的一方。
✨本日議題股：低軌衛星概念股 今日議題股聚焦低軌衛星概念股，在整體盤勢偏弱下逆勢吸金。題材面來自馬斯克公開發聲力挺低軌衛星發展，市場解讀產業前景「安啦」，帶動資金回流相關族群；盤面上， 元晶(6443) 、 華通(2313) 表現相對抗跌，延續低軌衛星題材支撐，成為資金避風港之一；同族群中， 啟碁(6285) 逆勢創下新天價，顯示市場對衛星通訊設備需求的想像空間仍在， 昇達科(3491) 亦同步走揚，強化族群熱度。不過，分析師...... 點我看更多
👥抱股過年怎麼選？： 隨著台股封關倒數進入最後階段，市場對於是否抱股過年討論升溫。根據近20年歷史統計資料，封關至開紅盤期間若持股過年，出現14勝6敗紀錄，開紅盤勝率約7成，顯示多數年份抱股策略有機會迎來年後紅盤行情；加上金馬年效應在市場心理層面偏向正面，也讓部分投資人選擇在長假前提前卡位。不過仍提醒...... 點我看更多
🔭重大財經事件展望 周二國際財經事件，先聚焦美國企業與就業數據動向，AMD將公布最新財報，成為觀察AI、PC與資料中心需求的重要指標，晚間則有美國JOLTS職位空缺數登場，攸關勞動市場熱度與聯準會後續利率政策判斷；其他國家方面，韓國將公布1月消費者物價指數（CPI），作為亞洲通膨趨勢風向球，澳洲則同步揭曉12月營建許可數據與澳洲央行2月利率決策，牽動房市與貨幣政策走向，另有巴西12月工業生產數據，觀察新興市場製造動能。
國內焦點則落在UPOWER年度展望說明會，關注產業景氣與公司營運前景；企業面方面，多檔重量級個股將舉行法說，包括 廣宇(2328) 、 中華電(2412) 、 可成(2474) 、 創意(3443) 、 世界(5347) ，有助市場釐清電子、電信與半導體後市展望；此外，博晟生醫(6733)啟動現金增資、久舜(5547)轉上櫃，相關籌碼變化與題材性表現同樣值得留意。
註：加權指數成交金額含盤後定價，不含零股、鉅額、拍賣及標購
（核稿編輯：劉凱銘）

news.Title: 成本壓力擴散PC產業鏈，美系外資降評譜瑞-KY及瑞昱、目標價下修
news.Content:
【財訊快報／記者劉居全報導】美系外資在新出爐的報告中指出，受到記憶體價格漲勢明顯超出原先預期，成本壓力快速向PC產業鏈擴散，對PC半導體族群造成結構性挑戰；美系外資同步調降譜瑞-KY(4966)及瑞昱(2379)評等及目標價，都由「加碼」調降至「中立」，其中譜瑞-KY目標價由780元下修至570元，瑞昱目標價由580元下修至550元。美系外資表示，早在去年11月曾提醒，PC半導體股難以受惠記憶體「超級循環」，近期包括Microsoft在內產業也指出，記憶體價格持續上揚，恐進一步抑制對PC市場需求。
美系外資表示，目前記憶體供應商的定價能力明顯強於原先假設，在成本提高下，PC半導體客戶恐需至少調漲約30%產品售價，才能反映記憶體成本上漲壓力，部分業者可能轉而採取重新封裝記憶體方式因應，恐進一步延後PC換機週期。
除記憶體外，其他關鍵零組件也同步出現漲價訊息，PC CPU供給吃緊推升價格走高；針對2026年第一季出貨表現偏強，美系外資認為，主要來自客戶提前備貨；美系外資預估，譜瑞-KY第一季營收可望季增5%至10%，不過示警，上半年需求提前拉貨，恐使的2026年下半年動能轉弱，甚至低於季節性水準。目前PC半導體客戶第一季整體表現優於季節性，但季比仍約持平或小幅下滑。
考量記憶體與零組件成本快速上升，以及上半年提前拉貨效應，美系外資對2026年下半年營運展望轉趨保守。
美系外資表示，譜瑞-KY因標準型產品客戶於下半年可能面臨更大價格壓力，決定調降評等至「中立」，目標價下修至580元，同時下修獲利預估。
至於瑞昱上半年營運動能可能前高後低，加上毛利率有壓，美系外資也調降瑞昱投資評等至「中立」，目標價下修至550元；不過長線仍看好其邊緣AI加速器新產品所帶來成長潛力。

news.Title: 雅特力 上櫃首日大漲63％
news.Content:
雅特力-KY（6907）29日以每股30元掛牌上櫃，終場大漲63％，收在49元，展現強勁蜜月行情走勢。
雅特力-KY為矽智財（IP）大廠智原科技轉投資公司，是一家專注於32位元微控制器（MCU）設計的公司，致力於推動全球市場的創新趨勢。
雅特力-KY主要研發採用ARM Cortex-M4／M0+核心的MCU產品，採用55nm／40nm的製程技術，28nm已在開發中。該公司提供高效能和高可靠的晶片，並專注於中高階應用，產品廣泛的應用在工業及馬達控制、消費性電子、電源管理、商務、車載、智能家居等各種領域，並成功打入國際知名品牌供應鏈。
隨著智慧聯網、智慧家電、工業自動化持續擴展，以及AI運算需求延伸至更多應用場景，將進一步推升整體市場需求，帶動MCU產業呈現穩健成長趨勢。
據Research Nester報告指出，2025年微控制器市場規模為394.8億美元，預計到2035年將超過1,042.8億美元，2026年至2035年的複合年增長率將超過10.2％。
2026年，微控制器的產業規模估計為431億美元，顯示MCU市場已邁入高成長軌道，具備強勁的發展動能，且將持續穩定攀升。雅特力-KY 2025年全年累積營收16.7億元，年增2％。

news.Title: 新兵報到 雅特力-KY 29日正式掛牌上櫃
news.Content:
雅特力-KY(6907)29日正式掛牌上櫃，為台股資本市場注入新動能。
雅特力-KY為矽智財(IP)大廠智原科技之轉投資公司，是一家專注於32位元微控制器(MCU)設計的公司，致力於推動全球市場的創新趨勢。雅特力-KY主要研發採用ARM® Cortex®-M4/M0+核心的MCU產品，採用55nm/40nm的製程技術，28nm已在開發中。
該公司提供高效能和高可靠的晶片，並專注於中高階應用，產品廣泛的應用在工業及馬達控制、消費性電子、電源管理、商務、車載、智能家居等各種領域，並成功打入國際知名品牌供應鏈，產品品質與性能備受肯定。

news.Title: 雅特力-KY掛牌上櫃，攻智慧化應用商機
news.Content:
MoneyDJ新聞 2026-01-29 09:39:42 周佩宇 發佈
雅特力-KY(6907)今(29)日正式掛牌上櫃，以每股 30 元開盤，早盤來到 53 元，漲幅逾 70%，展現新股蜜月行情。
雅特力-KY為矽智財（IP）大廠智原(3035)轉投資公司，專注於32位元微控制器（MCU）設計，主要研發採用 ARM Cortex-M4／M0+ 核心的 MCU 產品，製程涵蓋 55nm、40nm，28nm 已進入開發階段。公司鎖定中高階應用市場，產品應用於工業與馬達控制、消費性電子、電源管理、商務、車載及智慧家庭等領域，並成功打入多家國際品牌供應鏈。
隨著智慧聯網、智慧家電與工業自動化持續擴展，加上 AI 運算應用場景不斷下沉，帶動 MCU 市場需求穩定成長。Research Nester 指出，2025 年全球微控制器市場規模約 394.8 億美元，預估 2035 年將突破 1,042.8 億美元，2026 至 2035 年複合年成長率超過 10.2%；2026 年市場規模約 431 億美元，顯示 MCU 產業已進入成長加速期。
營運方面，雅特力-KY 2025 年全年累積營收為 16.7 億元，年增 2%。展望後市，公司將持續深化 MCU 核心技術布局並拓展海外市場，隨智慧化應用需求擴大，營運動能可望穩步推進。

news.Title: 《半導體》智原小金雞報到！雅特力-KY掛牌首日狂飆86.7%
news.Content:
【時報記者王逸芯台北報導】雅特力-KY（6907）今（29）日正式掛牌上櫃，蜜月行情火熱。以30元參考價開出後，早盤買盤湧入，股價一度衝高至56元，漲幅高達86.7%，成為盤面焦點。
雅特力-KY為矽智財（IP）大廠智原（3035）轉投資公司，專注於32位元微控制器（MCU）設計，致力推動全球市場的創新應用。公司主要研發採用ARM Cortex-M4／M0+核心的MCU產品，製程以55nm與40nm為主，28nm製程亦已進入開發階段，鎖定中高階應用市場，提供高效能、高可靠度的晶片解決方案。
產品應用範圍涵蓋工業與馬達控制、消費性電子、電源管理、商務設備、車載系統及智慧家庭等多元領域，並已成功打入多家國際知名品牌供應鏈，產品品質與性能獲市場高度肯定。
隨著智慧聯網、智慧家電及工業自動化持續擴展，加上AI運算需求逐步延伸至更多應用場景，整體市場需求持續升溫，帶動MCU產業呈現穩健成長趨勢。根據Research Nester報告，2025年全球微控制器市場規模約394.8億美元，預估至2035年將突破1,042.8億美元，2026年至2035年複合年成長率超過10.2%；其中，2026年產業規模估計達431億美元，顯示MCU市場已邁入高成長軌道，發展動能持續攀升。
雅特力-KY 2025年全年累計營收達16.7億元，年增2%。展望未來，公司將持續深耕MCU核心技術，強化海外市場布局，並精準掌握智慧化應用快速成長所帶來的市場機會，憑藉技術累積與前瞻布局，在全球智慧化浪潮中鞏固競爭優勢，推動營運表現朝長期、穩健成長邁進。

news.Title: 瑞昱第1季營運展望審慎正向　客戶回補庫存效應
news.Content:
（中央社記者張建中新竹2026年01月28日電）網通晶片廠瑞昱 (2379) 預期，2026年第1季在客戶回補庫存的效應下，對於短期營運持審慎正向態度。
瑞昱下午舉行線上法人說明會，公布2025年第4季營運結果。受客戶調整年底庫存水位影響，第4季營收滑落至新台幣262.8億元，季減約10.9%。
隨著產品組合變化，加上提列部分庫存呆滯料影響，瑞昱2025年第4季毛利率降至48.1%，較第3季下滑1.58個百分點，稅後淨利26.5億元，每股純益5.17元。
瑞昱2025年總營收1227.1億元，年增約8.2%，毛利率50%，稅後淨利147.5億元，每股純益28.77元。
展望未來，瑞昱表示，在客戶庫存回補及記憶體漲價預期的備貨效應下，對於2026年第1季營運展望審慎正向，不過，將持續關注外部環境與各終端市場變化。

news.Title: 台股收盤漲253點再創高 聯電、世界先進漲停揭原因
news.Content:
美股普遍上漲，標普500和那指連4漲，創下今年來最長記錄，台股今（27）日延續多頭氣勢，終場上漲 253.4點，收32317.92點，再度創下新高。
台積電最高漲25元至1785元，終場收在1780元。聯發科一度攻上1820元新高，終場收1775元。資金同步點火聯電與世界先進，兩檔紛紛攻上76.2元及159.5元漲停價。
外資野村看好成熟製程產能逐步外放，建議買進聯電，目標價調升到80元；世界先進雖維持中立評等，但同步上調目標價至150元，兩者升幅皆約五成。
記憶體股兩樣情，華邦電及十銓處置結束今出關，華邦電股價收盤漲2.21%，十銓收漲停，但南亞科及晶豪科跌逾3%。
台股26日收32064.52點，上漲103.01點或0.32%，總成交值7473.39億元。三大法人賣超89.41億元，外資賣超14.93億元，投信、自營商分別賣超41.27億元及賣超33.22億元。
美股道瓊上漲313.69點或0.64%，收49,412.40點。S&P500上漲34.62點或0.50%，收6,950.23點。NASDAQ上漲100.11點或0.43%，收23,601.36點。費城半導體下跌30.89點或0.39%，收7,927.04點。
